Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Dang, too bad Aneki hates cigarettes so much."
Umineko Project (UP): "Sheesh. Aneki's hatred of cigarettes is a real pain in the neck."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "My, my, what a shame that Aneki hates cigarettes so much."
PC Japanese (JP): 「やれやれ。姉貴の煙草嫌いにも参ったもんだな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「やれやれ。姉貴の煙草嫌いにも参ったもんだな」
Russian (RU): "М‐да, м‐да, какая жалость, что Анеки так ненавидит сигареты."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Francamente. O ódio da aneki por cigarros é mesmo um saco."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真是的。我算是敗給大姐的厭煙癖了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真是的。我算是败给大姐的厌烟癖了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Oh cielo, è un peccato che Aneki odi le sigarette così tanto."
Turkish (TR): "Amanın. Aneki'nin sigaraya olan nefreti gerçekten can sıkıcı."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Sorry. She's been pretty grumpy since last night. Please don't hold it against her."
Umineko Project (UP): "Sorry. She's been grumpy since last night. Think you could let it slide?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Sorry. She's been grumpy since last night. Would you mind ignoring it?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「すまんなぁ。昨夜からカリカリしとるんや。気にせんでやってくれんか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「すまんなぁ。昨夜からカリカリしとるんや。気にせんでやってくれんか」
Russian (RU): "Извини. Она с прошлого вечера в дурном настроении. Ты не мог бы не обращать внимания?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Desculpa. Ela está mal‐humorada desde a noite passada. Não acha que pode deixar isso passar?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「對不住吶。她從昨晚起心裡就很煩。請別介意吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对不住呐。她从昨晚起心里就很烦。请别介意呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Scusate. È dalla scorsa notte che è scontrosa. Vi dispiacerebbe non farci troppo caso? "
Turkish (TR): "Üzgünüm. Dün geceden beri huysuz. Bunu görmezden gelebilir misin?"

Steam (ST): Rudolf and Hideyoshi went out onto the deck and took out some cigarettes.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf and Hideyoshi went out onto the deck, and took out some cigarettes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫と秀吉は甲板に出て、煙草を取り出す。
Russian (RU): Рудольф и Хидэёши вышли на палубу и достали сигареты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf e Hideyoshi foram até o deck e pegaram um maço de cigarros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫與秀吉來到甲板，取出了香煙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫与秀吉来到甲板，取出了香烟。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf e Hideyoshi uscirono sul ponte e presero alcune sigarette.
Turkish (TR): Rudolf ve Hideyoshi güverteye çıktılar ve sigara çıkardılar.

Steam (ST): Eva had always hated the smell of cigarettes, but when she was in a bad mood, she got even more sensitive to them.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva had always hated the smell of cigarettes, but when she was in a bad mood, she got even more oversensitive.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva had always hated the smell of cigarettes, but when she was in a bad mood, she got even more oversensitive.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽が煙草の臭いを嫌うのは昔からのことだが、不機嫌になるとさらにそれが過敏になる。
Russian (RU): Ева всегда ненавидела запах сигарет, но когда пребывала в дурном расположении духа, то реагировала на него ещё острее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva sempre odiou o cheiro de cigarros, mas quando estava de mau humor, ela ficava ainda mais hipersensível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽從很久以前就很討厭香煙的氣味，人不高興時那就更過敏了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽从很久以前就很讨厌香烟的气味，人不高兴时那就更过敏了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva aveva da sempre odiato l'odore del fumo, ma quando era di cattivo umore ne diventava ancora più sensibile.
Turkish (TR): Eva sigara kokusundan her zaman nefret ederdi, ama kötü bir ruh halinde olduğunda daha da hassaslaşıyordu.

Steam (ST): When they decided to smoke casually until they reached the island, the two of them had gotten yelled at and chased out onto the deck.
Umineko Project (UP): The two of them had attempted to spend some relaxed time smoking until they made it to the island, but they had gotten yelled at and chased out onto the deck.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When they had decided to spend the time until they reached the island smoking casually, the two of them had been threatened and chased out onto the deck.
PC Japanese (JP): 島に着くまでをのんびり喫煙して過ごそうとした二人はそれを咎められ、甲板に追い出されたのだ。
Russian (RU): Когда они решили скоротать время до прибытия на остров за расслабленным курением сигарет, она пригрозила им и выгнала на палубу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os dois tentaram passar um tempo relaxando enquanto fumavam até chegar à ilha, mas eles foram repreendidos e mandados para o deck.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她狠狠地斥責了打算在上島前悠閑地抽抽煙的秀吉與留弗夫，將他們趕到了甲板上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她狠狠地斥责了打算在上岛前悠闲地抽抽烟的秀吉与留弗夫，将他们赶到了甲板上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nel momento in cui avevano deciso di spendere il tempo che mancava all'arrivo fumando con aria indifferente, erano stati minacciati e scacciati sul ponte.
Turkish (TR): İkisi adaya varana kadar sigara eşliğinde rahat bir zaman geçirmeye çalışmışlar ama bağırış çağırış eşliğinde güverteye kovulmuşlardı.

Steam (ST): Hideyoshi tried to use his lighter, but the strong winds gave him some trouble. Rudolf took out a Zippo with a smooth gesture and let Hideyoshi borrow the flame.
Umineko Project (UP): Hideyoshi tried to use his lighter, but it didn't go well with all of the strong winds on the deck.{n}Rudolf took out a Zippo with a stylish gesture, and let Hideyoshi borrow the flame.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Hideyoshi tried to use his lighter, but it didn't go well with all of the strong winds on the deck. Rudolf took out a Zippo with a stylish gesture, and let Hideyoshi borrow the flame.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉はライターを灯すが、甲板の強風でうまく付かない。留弗夫は、洒落た仕草でジッポを取り出すと、秀吉に火を貸すのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 秀吉はライターを灯すが、甲板の強風でうまく付かない。{n}留弗夫は、洒落た仕草でジッポを取り出すと、秀吉に火を貸すのだった。
Russian (RU): Хидэёши попытался воспользоваться своей зажигалкой, но из‐за сильного ветра на палубе у него ничего не получалось.{n}Рудольф стильным жестом достал Зиппо и дал Хидэёши прикурить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Hideyoshi tentou usar seu isqueiro, mas não parecia funcionar muito bem devido ao forte vento que batia no deck.{n}Rudolf retirou um Zippo de seu bolso com um gesto refinado e emprestou a Hideyoshi sua chama.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 秀吉摁燃了打火機，但由於甲板上的強風，沒法好好點上煙。{n}留弗夫以一記瀟灑的動作取出了 {c:86EF9C:ZIPPO}，給秀吉借了個火。{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書同名條目）}
Chinese Simplified (CN): 秀吉摁燃了打火机，但由于甲板上的强风，没法好好点上烟。{n}留弗夫以一记潇洒的动作取出了 {c:86EF9C:ZIPPO}，给秀吉借了个火。{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书同名条目）}
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Hideyoshi provò ad usare il suo accendino, ma fallì a causa del vento che sul ponte soffiava molto forte. Rudolf tirò fuori uno Zippo con un gesto elegante e permise ad Hideyoshi di usare la fiamma.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi çakmağını kullanmayı denedi ama güvertedeki şiddetli rüzgâr yüzünden pek işe yaramadı.{n}Rudolf şık bir hareketle bir Zippo çıkardı ve Hideyoshi'ye ateşini uzattı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "When did you start smoking cigarettes, Hideyoshi nii-san?"
Umineko Project (UP): "When did you start smoking, Hideyoshi nii‐san?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "When did you start smoking cigarettes, Hideyoshi nii-san?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Quando você começou a fumar, Hideyoshi nii‐san?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「秀吉姐夫是从什么时候开始抽烟的？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quando hai cominciato a fumare, Hideyoshi nii-san?"
Turkish (TR): "Hideyoshi nii-san, sigaraya ne zaman başladın?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Just after the war. In the beginnin', I was rollin' 'em. Then I started usin' what I sold. Wahahahahahahaha."
Umineko Project (UP): "Just after the war. In the beginnin', I was rollin' 'em. Then I started usin' what I was sellin'. Wahahahahahahaha."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦後すぐや。最初は煙草を転がしとってなぁ。自分の売り物に手を付けてしまったわけや。わははははははは。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「戦後すぐや。最初は煙草を転がしとってなぁ。自分の売り物に手を付けてしまったわけや。わははははははは」
Russian (RU): "Сразу после войны. Поначалу я их сворачивал. А затем перешёл на то, чем торговал. Аха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Logo depois da guerra. No começo, eu só revendia os cigarros. Até que comecei a usar aquilo que eu estava vendendo. Wahahahahahahaha."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「戰後沒多久吶。俺起初是倒賣香煙的。就是對自己的商品出了手吶。哇哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战后没多久呐。俺起初是倒卖香烟的。就是对自己的商品出了手呐。哇哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Subito dopo la guerra. All'inizio io ero quello che le rollava. E dopo ho iniziato ad usare quello che stavo vendendo. Wahahahahahahaha."
Turkish (TR): "Savaşın hemen sonrasında. İlk başta, sadece sarıyordum. Sonra sattıklarımı kullanmaya başladım. Wahahahahahahaha."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "So you were already smoking when you met Aneki. Bet she's always telling you to stop."
Umineko Project (UP): "So you were already smoking when you met Aneki. I'll bet she's always telling you to stop."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「じゃあ、姉貴と会った時にはもう吸ってたわけだ。姉貴には、ずいぶん止めろ止めろと言われたでしょう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「じゃあ、姉貴と会った時にはもう吸ってたわけだ。姉貴には、ずいぶん止めろ止めろと言われたでしょう」
Russian (RU): "Стало быть, ты встретился с Анеки уже будучи курильщиком. Держу пари, она всё время говорила тебе бросить это дело."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então você já fumava quando conheceu a aneki. Aposto que ela sempre disse para você parar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那，姐夫在遇見大姐時就已經在抽了呢。被大姐說過好多次“別抽了別抽了”了吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那，姐夫在遇见大姐时就已经在抽了呢。被大姐说过好多次“别抽了别抽了”了吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quindi già fumavi quando hai conosciuto Aneki. Scommetto che ti dice in continuazione di smettere."
Turkish (TR): "Yani Aneki'yle tanıştığın zaman zaten sigara içiyordun. Aneki'nin sana bırakmanı söyleyip durduğuna eminim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "I never listened to her, so she's already completely given up on that. Wahaha, men gotta be stubborn, times like these."
Umineko Project (UP): "I never listened to her, so she's already completely given up on that. Wahaha, looks like men've gotta be stubborn."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I never listened to her, so she's already completely given up on that. Wahaha, looks like men have got to be stubborn."
PC Japanese (JP): 「わしが聞く耳持たんもんだから、あれももうすっかり諦めよった。わはは、やはり男は強情でなくてはあかんな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「わしが聞く耳持たんもんだから、あれももうすっかり諦めよった。わはは、やはり男は強情でなくてはあかんな」
Russian (RU): "Я никогда её не слушал. Аха‐ха, похоже, мужчина временами должен проявить упрямство."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu nunca a escutei, então ela acabou desistindo completamente. Wahaha, parece que homens são mesmo teimosos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「俺這個人是聽不進這種話的，你姐也已經完全死心了。哇哈哈，男人果然是得強硬點吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「俺这个人是听不进这种话的，你姐也已经完全死心了。哇哈哈，男人果然是得强硬点呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non le ho mai dato retta, quindi si è ormai completamente arresa. Wahaha, a quanto pare anche gli uomini hanno imparato ad essere testardi."
Turkish (TR): "Ona hiç kulak asmadım, o da bunu yapmayı çoktan bıraktı. Wahaha, görünüşe göre erkekler inatçı olmak zorunda."

Steam (ST): Hideyoshi laughed heartily, but Rudolf snickered.
Umineko Project (UP): Hideyoshi laughed heartily, but Rudolf chuckled.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉は豪快そうに笑って見せるが、留弗夫はくすりと笑う。
Russian (RU): Хидэёши от души рассмеялся, а Рудольф лишь усмехнулся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Hideyoshi riu cordialmente, mas Rudolf riu de forma abafada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看著秀吉那貌似豪快的笑容，留弗夫不禁一笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看着秀吉那貌似豪快的笑容，留弗夫不禁一笑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Hideyoshi rise di cuore, mentre Rudolf trattenne la risata.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi içtenlikle güldü ama Rudolf kıkırdadı.

Steam (ST): After being scolded by Eva, they'd escaped to the deck together with their tails between their legs. There was little doubt who had gotten her way in that exchange.
Umineko Project (UP): After being scolded by Eva and told to smoke outside, they had dejectedly fled to the deck together. There was almost no doubt he was under her thumb.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After they had been scolded by Eva, they had dejectedly ran out onto the deck together. They had almost certainly been dominated by her.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽に表で吸えと叱られて、一緒にすごすごと甲板に逃げ出してきたのだ。尻に敷かれているに、ほぼ間違いあるまい。
Russian (RU): Обруганные Евой, они удручённо выбежали на палубу. Она определённо доминировала над ними.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após ser repreendido por Eva e ter sido mandado fumar do lado de fora, eles foram juntos para o exterior do barco, abatidos. Não restavam dúvidas de que ele estava sob suas ordens.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽一吼“到外面抽去”，他倆就一起灰溜溜地逃到了甲板上。應該是妻管嚴無疑了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽一吼“到外面抽去”，他俩就一起灰溜溜地逃到了甲板上。应该是妻管严无疑了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo essere stati sgridati da Eva, erano corsi sul ponte con la coda tra le gambe. Erano senza dubbio stati dominati da lei.
Turkish (TR): Eva tarafından azarlandıktan ve sigaralarını dışarıda içmeleri söylendikten sonra, keyifsiz bir şekilde birlikte güverteye çıkmışlardı. Onun, Eva'nın kontrolü altında olduğuna neredeyse hiç şüphe yoktu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "...She isn't usually so short-tempered. ...In fact, she's usually a more gentle, quiet woman. Every year, she changes when this day comes."
Umineko Project (UP): "...She isn't usually so short‐tempered. ......Nah, she's usually a more gentle, quiet woman. Every year, she changes when this day comes."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...She isn't usually so short-tempered. ......Nah, she's usually a more gentle, quiet woman. Every year, she changes when this day comes."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…普段はあそこまで短気じゃないんや。……いいや、普段はもっと温和な、大人しい女なんやで。毎年毎年、この日になると人が変わりよるんや。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…普段はあそこまで短気じゃないんや。……いいや、普段はもっと温和な、大人しい女なんやで。毎年毎年、この日になると人が変わりよるんや」
Russian (RU): "...Она обычно не столь вспыльчива. ...Нет, обычно она более добрая, тихая женщина. Но она меняется каждый год с наступлением этого дня."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Ela normalmente não tem esse temperamento curto. ......Não, ela costuma ser mais gentil, uma mulher reservada. Todo ano, ela muda quando esse dia chega."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…你姐平常不是這麼爆脾氣的。……不，平常她可是個更加溫和的，文靜女人吶。每年一到這一天，人就變了吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…你姐平常不是这么爆脾气的。……不，平常她可是个更加温和的，文静女人呐。每年一到这一天，人就变了呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Di solito non è così irascibile. ... No, abitualmente è una donna più gentile e tranquilla. Ogni anno, quando arriva questo giorno, lei cambia."
Turkish (TR): "...Normalde bu kadar asabi değildir. ......Aslında, genellikle çok daha nazik ve sakin bir kadındır. Her yıl, bu gün geldiğinde değişir."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Is that so? To me, she looks just like the Aneki we've all known so long."
Umineko Project (UP): "Is that so? To me, she looks just like the Aneki we've all known for so long."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうなんですか？　俺らがよく知る昔っからの姉貴そのものに見えますがねぇ」

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………………。まぁ、カリカリする気持ちもわかります。…今回の親族会議は面倒だ」
Russian (RU): "..................Что ж, я могу понять, чего она не в духе. ...Это семейное собрание будет тем ещё геморроем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".................. Bem, eu consigo entender o motivo dela estar mal‐humorada.{n}...Essa conferência familiar vai ser um saco."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………………。不過，我也很理解大姐為何會心煩。…這次親族會議可棘手啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………………。不过，我也很理解大姐为何会心烦。…这次亲族会议可棘手啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Beh, posso capire perché è così di malumore. ... Questa conferenza di famiglia sarà un vero tormento."
Turkish (TR): ".................. Peki, neden huysuz olduğunu anlayabiliyorum. ...Bu yılın aile konferansı tam bir eziyet olacak."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "...Got that right. There's that plan to threaten money out of Krauss nii-san... We may call it a family conference, but it's gonna be just a sibling fight at this rate."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Sure is. ...That plan to threaten money out of Krauss nii‐san. It's a family conference only in name, really it's just a fight between siblings."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Very true. ...That plan to threaten money out of Krauss nii-san. Even though we call it a family conference, it's really just a fight between the siblings."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そやな。…あの蔵臼兄さんから、カネを脅し取ろうっちゅう計画や。親族会議なんて名ばかりの、こりゃただの兄弟喧嘩や。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そやな。…あの蔵臼兄さんから、カネを脅し取ろうっちゅう計画や。親族会議なんて名ばかりの、こりゃただの兄弟喧嘩や」
Russian (RU): "...И не говори. ...Этот план по выбиванию денег из Краусса нии‐сана. Хоть мы и называем грядущее мероприятие семейным собранием, на самом деле это лишь грызня между братьями и сёстрами."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Com certeza. ...O plano é ameaçar o dinheiro do Krauss nii‐san. É uma conferência familiar apenas no nome, mas, na realidade, não passa de uma briga entre os irmãos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是吶。…畢竟是計劃好了，要逼迫那位藏臼兄交出錢來吶。親族會議就只剩個名字了，完全成了場兄妹內訌吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呐。…毕竟是计划好了，要逼迫那位藏臼兄交出钱来呐。亲族会议就只剩个名字了，完全成了场兄妹内讧呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Già. ... Quel piano per estorcere soldi da Krauss nii-san. Sebbene la chiamiamo conferenza di famiglia, è in verità una lotta tra fratelli."
Turkish (TR): "......Gerçekten. ...Şu Krauss nii-san'dan para koparmak için yaptığımız tehdit planı... Bu sadece ismen bir aile konferansı, aslında kardeşler arasında bir kavgadan fazlası değil."

Steam (ST): Before the family conference, three of the siblings had made a secret pact without Krauss.
Umineko Project (UP): With the family conference ahead of them, the three siblings excluding Krauss had made a secret contract.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Before the family conference, three of the siblings had made a secret contract without Krauss.
PC Japanese (JP): 親族会議を前に、蔵臼を除く３人の兄弟は密約を結んでいた。
Russian (RU): До семейного собрания брат и сёстры втроём заключили тайный союз, не включавший Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com a conferência familiar chegando, os irmãos, excluindo Krauss, fizeram um pacto secreto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在親族會議前夕，除藏臼以外的三兄妹締結了密約。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在亲族会议前夕，除藏臼以外的三兄妹缔结了密约。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Prima della conferenza, tre dei fratelli avevano fatto un contratto segreto senza Krauss.
Turkish (TR): Önlerindeki aile konferansı için, Krauss dışındaki üç kardeş gizli bir anlaşma yapmıştı.

Steam (ST): They were all facing urgent situations and needed a lot of money fast.
Umineko Project (UP): Each of them had a pressing situation to deal with, and urgently needed a lot of money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The situation that pressed at all of them was an urgent need for a lot of money.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らには互いに差し迫った状況があり、取り急ぎ莫大なカネが必要なのだ。
Russian (RU): В сложившейся ситуации все они крайне нуждались в больших денежных суммах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cada um deles tem alguma situação complicada que precisam resolver, e precisam urgentemente de muito dinheiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們彼此都有迫近的危機，急需一大筆錢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们彼此都有迫近的危机，急需一大笔钱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La situazione che li opprimeva tutti quanti era un urgente bisogno di soldi.
Turkish (TR): Her birinin halletmesi gereken acil bir durumu vardı ve acilen yüklü miktarda paraya ihtiyaçları vardı.

Steam (ST): And the only one they could turn to was Krauss, who spoke for the Ushiromiya Head now that Kinzo spent his time shut up in his study.
Umineko Project (UP): And the only one who could help them was Krauss, who spoke for the Ushiromiya head, since Kinzo was shut up in his study.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And the only one who could help them was Krauss, who spoke for the Ushiromiya head, since Kinzo was shut up in his study.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそのアテは、書斎に閉じ篭った金蔵に代わって、右代宮家の当主を代行する蔵臼しかない。
Russian (RU): И единственным, кто мог бы выручить их, был Краусс, говоривший от имени главы семьи Уширомия с тех пор, как Кинзо заперся в своём кабинете.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E o único que pode ajudá‐los é Krauss, que fala pelo chefe da família Ushiromiya, desde que Kinzo se trancou em seu estúdio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後他們能找的冤大頭，就只有為在書房閉門不出的金藏，代理右代宮家當主的藏臼一個。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后他们能找的冤大头，就只有为在书房闭门不出的金藏，代理右代宫家当主的藏臼一个。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E l'unico che avrebbe potuto aiutarli era Krauss, che parlava in vece del capofamiglia, dal momento che Kinzo si era rinchiuso nel suo studio.
Turkish (TR): Ve Kinzo çalışma odasına kapandığı için onlara yardım edebilecek tek kişi, Ushiromiya reisi adına konuşabilen Krauss'tu.

Steam (ST): For a long time now, they'd vaguely sensed that Krauss was taking advantage of the fact that Kinzo had lost interest in his own wealth, and they suspected that he'd started embezzling that wealth to suit his own purposes.
Umineko Project (UP): They had long felt that Krauss had started taking advantage of Kinzo's loss of interest in his own wealth, and was embezzling that wealth for his own use.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since long ago, they had felt that Krauss was taking advantage of Kinzo's loss of interest in his own wealth, and had started embezzling that wealth for his own use.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼が、金蔵が財産に関心を失ったのをいい事に、それを私物化し摘み食いをしていることは、ずいぶん前から薄々と感付いていた。
Russian (RU): Брат и сёстры уже давно ощущали, что Краусс в корыстных целях воспользовался потерей Кинзо интереса к своему богатству и начал растрачивать это богатство для собственных целей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Há tempos eles têm um pressentimento de que Krauss começou a tirar vantagem da perda de interesse de Kinzo em relação à sua própria fortuna, e está desviando essa riqueza para uso pessoal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 几兄妹在很久以前就略微察覺到了，藏臼正借著金藏不再關心財產的機會，偷偷地蠶食財產，將之私有化。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 几兄妹在很久以前就略微察觉到了，藏臼正借着金藏不再关心财产的机会，偷偷地蚕食财产，将之私有化。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da parecchio tempo, avevano la sensazione che Krauss stesse approfittando della perdita di interesse di Kinzo per il suo patrimonio, e che si stesse appropriando indebitamente di quel patrimonio per i suoi scopi.
Turkish (TR): Uzun zamandır Krauss'un Kinzo'nun kendi servetine olan ilgisini kaybetmesinden faydalanmaya başladığını, ve bu serveti kendi kullanımı için zimmetine geçirdiğini düşünüyorlardı.

Steam (ST): Despite being disgusted by this, they'd turned a blind eye to it while everything was still going smoothly for them, ...but now that they needed money, they really couldn't afford to let it slide.
Umineko Project (UP): When everything had been going well for the siblings, even though they had found it detestable, they had pretended not to notice, ...but now that they needed money, they couldn't just quietly accept that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When everything had been going well for the siblings, even though they had found it detestable, they had pretended not to notice, ...but now that they needed money, they couldn't just quietly accept that.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分たちが軌道に乗っている時は、憎々しく思いながらも、見て見ぬふりをしていたが、…自分たちにもカネがいる今の状況では、それはとても黙認できるものではない。
Russian (RU): Пока у его брата и сестёр всё шло хорошо, они притворялись, будто не замечают, пусть даже и находили это отвратительным... Но теперь, когда им потребовались деньги, они не могли молча принять этот факт.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando tudo estava indo bem para os irmãos, mesmo pensando que isso era detestável, eles fingiam não perceber, ...mas agora que eles precisavam do dinheiro, não podiam aceitar aquilo em silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然在自己的人生穩步於軌道上時，只會憤恨地睜一隻眼閉一隻眼，…但到了自身急需用錢的現在，就怎麼都無法將此默認了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然在自己的人生稳步于轨道上时，只会愤恨地睁一只眼闭一只眼，…但到了自身急需用钱的现在，就怎么都无法将此默认了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando tutto andava bene ai fratelli, sebbene lo trovassero insopportabile, loro facevano semplicemente finta di non farci caso... ma ora che avevano bisogno di soldi, non potevano semplicemente accettarlo in silenzio.
Turkish (TR): Kardeşler için her şey yolunda giderken, bunu tiksindirici bulsalar da fark etmemiş gibi davranmışlardı, ...ama şimdi paraya ihtiyaçları vardı ve bunu öyle sessizce kabul edemezlerdi.

Steam (ST): Eva had asked Rudolf and Rosa to form an alliance, and they were now scheming to take that money away from Krauss.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva had called Rudolf and Rosa into an alliance, and they were planning to exploit that knowledge in order to draw money out of Krauss...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva had called Rudolf and Rosa into an alliance, and they had schemed to take that money away from Krauss.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽は、留弗夫と楼座に連帯を呼び掛け、それを突く事で蔵臼からカネを引き出そうと企んでいる…。
Russian (RU): Ева позвала Рудольфа и Розу в союз, и они замыслили путем интриги забрать эти деньги у Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva chamou Rudolf e Rosa para formarem uma aliança, e eles planejavam aproveitar esse conhecimento para conseguir o dinheiro de Krauss...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽聯合起了留弗夫與樓座，企圖通過抖出此事來向藏臼詐錢…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽联合起了留弗夫与楼座，企图通过抖出此事来向藏臼诈钱…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva aveva riunito Rudolf e Rosa in un'alleanza e avevano progettato di estorcere quei soldi da Krauss.
Turkish (TR): Eva, Rudolf ve Rosa'yı işbirliği yapmaya davet etmişti ve birlikte Krauss'tan para koparmak için bu durumdan faydalanmayı planlıyorlardı...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "......Rudolf-kun, both you and I are company presidents. We're responsible for the livelihood of our employees."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Rudolf‐kun, both you and I are company presidents. We are responsible for the livelihood of our employees."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Rudolf-kun, both you and I are company presidents. We are responsible for the livelihood of our employees."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………わしも、そして留弗夫くんも社長や。社員の生活を背負っとる身や。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………わしも、そして留弗夫くんも社長や。社員の生活を背負っとる身や」
Russian (RU): "...Рудольф‐кун, мы с тобой оба президенты компаний. Мы несём ответственность за благосостояние наших работников."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Rudolf‐kun, tanto eu quanto você somos presidentes de empresas.{n}Nós somos responsáveis pelo sustento de nossos empregados."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………俺還有留弗夫君都是社長吶。是背負著職員生計之身吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………俺还有留弗夫君都是社长呐。是背负着职员生计之身呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Rudolf-kun, sia tu che io siamo presidenti di una compagnia. Noi siamo responsabili per il sostentamento dei nostri impiegati."
Turkish (TR): ".........Rudolf-kun, sen de ben de şirket başkanlarıyız. Çalışanlarımızın geçiminden biz sorumluyuz."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Rosa's a president too. Well, as a hobby."
Umineko Project (UP): "Rosa is a president too. Well, as a hobby."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「楼座も社長ですよ。まぁ、道楽ですが。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「楼座も社長ですよ。まぁ、道楽ですが」
Russian (RU): "Роза тоже президент. Ну, в качестве хобби."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A Rosa também é presidente. Bem, como um passatempo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「樓座也是社長。不過，也就只是玩玩。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「楼座也是社长。不过，也就只是玩玩。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anche Rosa è un presidente. Beh, come passatempo."
Turkish (TR): "Rosa da bir başkan. Yani, hobi olarak."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "That's right, sorry. ...Basically, we've all got responsibilities."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right, sorry. ......In short, all of us are bearin' some burden."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうやな、失礼。……つまり、わしらは誰もが、背負うモノを持っとるっちゅうことや。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうやな、失礼。……つまり、わしらは誰もが、背負うモノを持っとるっちゅうことや」
Russian (RU): "Верно, прости. ...Короче говоря, на всех нас лежит тяжкое бремя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Tem razão, me desculpe. ......Resumindo, todos nós carregamos algum tipo de fardo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是吶，抱歉。……總之，俺們中的無論誰，都有背負之物吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是呐，抱歉。……总之，俺们中的无论谁，都有背负之物呐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hai ragione, scusa. ... Per farla breve, ognuno di noi ha un peso sulle proprie spalle."
Turkish (TR): "Doğru, üzgünüm. ......Kısacası, hepimiz biraz yük taşıyoruz."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...Now that I've thrown down the gauntlet in front of the executive board, I've gotta bring in the money, even if it means getting down on my knees or drinking mud."
Umineko Project (UP): "...Now that I've thrown the gauntlet down in front of the executive board, I gotta bring in the money, even if it means I have to grovel or even drink mud."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Now that I have thrown the gauntlet down in front of the executive board, I gotta bring in the money, even if it means I have to kneel or even drink mud."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…俺も、幹部連中の前で啖呵を切った以上、土下座しても、泥を啜ってでもカネを引っ張ってこなきゃならない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…俺も、幹部連中の前で啖呵を切った以上、土下座しても、泥を啜ってでもカネを引っ張ってこなきゃならない」
Russian (RU): "...Теперь, когда я бросил перчатку перед правлением, я должен добыть деньги, даже если это означает, что мне придётся встать на колени или хлебать грязь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Agora que eu joguei a luva na frente do comitê executivo, preciso apresentar o dinheiro, mesmo que isso signifique que eu tenha que rastejar ou beber lama."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…我也是，既然已在公司高層們面前噼哩啪啦地誇下了海口，那下跪也好，啃泥也好，無論如何都一定要把錢搞到手。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…我也是，既然已在公司高层们面前噼哩啪啦地夸下了海口，那下跪也好，啃泥也好，无论如何都一定要把钱搞到手。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ora che ho sfidato apertamente il consiglio d'amministrazione, devo portare i soldi, anche se questo significasse doversi inginocchiare o persino mangiare del fango."
Turkish (TR): "...Artık yönetim kurulunun önünde elimi taşın altına koyduğuma göre, dizlerimin üzerine çökmem ve hatta çamur içinde yuvarlanmam gerekse bile parayı getirmeliyim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Same here. ...I can't betray the employees who've trusted me and followed me for so long. ...That's why I need to get some money out of Krauss nii-san, even if I have to grab him by the neck."
Umineko Project (UP): "Same here. ...I can't betray my employees who've trusted me and followed me for so long. ......That's why I gotta get some money out of Krauss nii‐san, even if I have to grab him by the neck."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Same here. ...I can't betray those employees who've trusted me and followed me for so long. ......That's why I must get some money out of Krauss nii-san, even if I have to grab him by the neck."
PC Japanese (JP): 「お互い様や。…わしも、わしを信じて付いて来てくれた社員たちを裏切れん。……それこそ、蔵臼兄さんの首根っこを引っ掴んででも、カネを引っ張り出さんといかんのや。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お互い様や。…わしも、わしを信じて付いて来てくれた社員たちを裏切れん。……それこそ、蔵臼兄さんの首根っこを引っ掴んででも、カネを引っ張り出さんといかんのや」
Russian (RU): "Аналогично. ...Я не могу предать тех работников, доверявших мне и следовавших за мной так долго. ......Вот почему я обязан выбить деньги из Краусса нии‐сана, даже если придётся взять его за горло ."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O mesmo aqui. ...Eu não posso trair meus empregados que confiaram em mim e me seguiram por tanto tempo. ......Por isso, eu preciso conseguir algum dinheiro com o Krauss nii‐san, mesmo que eu precise agarrá‐lo pelo pescoço."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「彼此彼此吶。…俺也不會背叛，相信俺跟著俺的職員們的。……就算是要俺抓住藏臼兄的脖頸，俺也一定要搞到錢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「彼此彼此呐。…俺也不会背叛，相信俺跟着俺的职员们的。……就算是要俺抓住藏臼兄的脖颈，俺也一定要搞到钱。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Lo stesso vale per me. ... Non posso tradire quegli impiegati che si sono fidati di me e che mi hanno seguito per così tanto tempo. ... Per questo io devo prendere un po' di denaro a Krauss nii-san, anche se questo dovesse significare afferrarlo per il collo."
Turkish (TR): "Aynı şekilde. ...Bana güvenen ve uzun süredir beni takip eden çalışanlarıma ihanet edemem. ......Bu yüzden Krauss nii-san'ı boynundan tutmam gerekse bile biraz para almam gerek."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Aneki and Aniki have always been at each other's throats. ...And now she's gotta challenge Aniki head on. It's no wonder she's on edge."
Umineko Project (UP): "Aneki has always been at odds with Aniki. ...And now she has to have a full‐on confrontation with him. That's probably enough to make her grumpy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Aneki has always been at odds with Aniki. ...And now she must oppose Aniki completely. That's probably enough to make her grumpy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「姉貴は、昔っから兄貴とは犬猿だ。…その兄貴と全面対決しなくちゃならねぇんだから。そりゃあカリカリもするだろうよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「姉貴は、昔っから兄貴とは犬猿だ。…その兄貴と全面対決しなくちゃならねぇんだから。そりゃあカリカリもするだろうよ」
Russian (RU): "Анеки всегда была не в ладах с Аники. ...А сейчас она должна открыто выступить против него. Полагаю, этого достаточно, чтобы сделать её раздражительной."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A aneki sempre teve suas desavenças com o aniki. ...E agora ela tem total motivação para confrontá‐lo. Isso provavelmente é o suficiente para deixá‐la mal‐humorada."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「大姐從前就與大哥勢如水火。…必須要與這位大哥全面對決。那倒是會非常心煩呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「大姐从前就与大哥势如水火。…必须要与这位大哥全面对决。那倒是会非常心烦呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tra Aneki e Aniki non sono mai scorse buone acque. ... E ora doveva opporsi completamente ad Aniki... Questo è sufficiente per renderla di cattivo umore."
Turkish (TR): "Aneki her zaman Aniki ile anlaşmazlık içinde olmuştur. ...Ve şimdi onunla tamamen yüzleşmek zorunda. Bu muhtemelen onu huysuzlaştırmaya yeter."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Wouldn't you say schooling for women is like sugar in black tea? The taste is dull and flat without it, but too much ruins the whole thing."
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't you think that schooling for women is like sugar in black tea? Without it, it is bland, but too much of it ruins the tea."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Don't you think that schooling for women is like sugar in black tea? Without it, there's no taste, but too much of it ruins the tea."
PC Japanese (JP): 「女の学力は、紅茶の砂糖にも似ていると思わないかね？　ないのも味気ないが、過ぎれば紅茶の味わいを大いに損なう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「女の学力は、紅茶の砂糖にも似ていると思わないかね？　ないのも味気ないが、過ぎれば紅茶の味わいを大いに損なう」
Russian (RU): "Считаешь ли ты, что образование для женщины — как сахар в чёрном чае? Без него вкуса нет, но избыток портит чай."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você não acha que escolaridade para uma mulher é como açúcar no chá preto? Sem ele, se torna brando, mas se colocar demais, pode acabar com o chá."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「覺不覺得，女人的學力就像搭配紅茶的砂糖？雖然不加是會缺少點味道，但加多了可是會大大損害紅茶的風味。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「觉不觉得，女人的学力就像搭配红茶的砂糖？虽然不加是会缺少点味道，但加多了可是会大大损害红茶的风味。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non pensi che l'istruzione in una donna è come lo zucchero nel tè nero? {n}Senza di esso, non sa di nulla, ma troppo ne rovina il sapore."
Turkish (TR): "Kadınlar için eğitimin siyah çaydaki şeker gibi olduğunu düşünmüyor musun? Şekersiz yavan oluyor ama fazlası da çayı mahvediyor."

Steam (ST): ...Since you can still drink black tea without sugar, he was in effect saying that there was no need for women to study.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Since you can still drink black tea without sugar, it was exactly the same as saying that study was unnecessary for a woman.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Since you can still drink black tea without sugar, it was almost the same as saying that study was unnecessary for a woman.
PC Japanese (JP): …紅茶は、砂糖がなくとも飲めることを思えば、これはつまり、女に学問は不要だと言っているのとまったく同じだ。
Russian (RU): ...Поскольку чай можно пить и без сахара, это было почти то же самое, как сказать, что женщина не нуждается в образовании.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Como você ainda pode tomar o chá preto sem açúcar, é exatamente o mesmo que dizer que o estudo é desnecessário para uma mulher.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …一想到紅茶不加砂糖也能喝，就會意識到，他說的這句話與“女人不需要學問”完全等同。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …一想到红茶不加砂糖也能喝，就会意识到，他说的这句话与“女人不需要学问”完全等同。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Dal momento che si può anche bere il tè nero senza lo zucchero, era come dire che l'istruzione non era necessaria ad una donna.
Turkish (TR): ...Siyah çayı şekersiz de içebildiğiniz için, bu bir kadın için okumanın gereksiz olduğunu söylemekle aynı şeydi.

Steam (ST): Those infuriating words were what Nii-san hurled at me in my despair, when I asked to go to college only to be denied by Father.
Umineko Project (UP): Those infuriating words were ones that my older brother had abused me with when I had been in despair, wanting to go to college but denied by Father.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Those infuriating words were ones that my older brother had abused me with when I had been in despair, when I had wanted to go to college but was rejected by Father.
PC Japanese (JP): この腹立たしい言葉は、私が大学院を希望したが父に拒否され、失意の私に兄が吐いた暴言だ。
Russian (RU): Этими доводящими до бешенства словами мой старший брат изводил меня, когда я была в отчаянии от того, что хотела поступить в университет, но получила отказ от отца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essas palavras enfurecedoras eram as que meu irmão mais velho usou para abusar de mim quando eu estava em desespero, querendo ir para a faculdade, mas tendo essa vontade negada pelo pai.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這句氣人的話，正是我想讀研究生的願望被父親拒絕時，大哥向失意的我吐的惡言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这句气人的话，正是我想读研究生的愿望被父亲拒绝时，大哥向失意的我吐的恶言。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quelle parole che mi facevano infuriare erano quelle con cui il mio fratello maggiore mi insultava quando ero caduta nella disperazione, quando avrei voluto andare al college, ma nostro Padre non me l'aveva permesso.
Turkish (TR): Bu çileden çıkarıcı sözler, üniversiteye gitmek istediğim ama babam tarafından reddedildiğim için umutsuzluğa kapıldığım zamanlarda büyük erkek kardeşimin beni taciz ettiği sözlerdi.

Steam (ST): I protested that I needed to build up proper dignity and an education as the oldest daughter in the Ushiromiya family, making college an essential next step.
Umineko Project (UP): I had protested that advancing to college was essential if I was to acquire the education and class befitting the eldest daughter of the Ushiromiya family.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had protested that, as the oldest daughter in the Ushiromiya family, I needed to gain proper dignity and an education, so advancing to college was essential.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は、自分が右代宮家の長女として相応しい品格と教養を身につける上で、大学院進学は必要なものだと訴えた。
Russian (RU): Я протестовала, аргументируя, что как старшая дочь семьи Уширомия должна обрести подобающее благородство и такое же образование, следовательно поступление в университет было необходимым шагом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu protestei afirmando que ir para a faculdade era essencial se eu quisesse adquirir educação e ser digna de ser a filha mais velha da família.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我向父親說了，為了身負與作為右代宮家長女相稱的品格與教養，進修研究生是必不可缺的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我向父亲说了，为了身负与作为右代宫家长女相称的品格与教养，进修研究生是必不可缺的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avevo protestato dicendo che, come figlia maggiore della famiglia Ushiromiya, avevo bisogno di acquisire un'adatta educazione e dignità, e che quindi era necessario andare al college.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesinin en büyük kızına yakışır bir eğitim ve mevki elde edebilmem için üniversiteye gitmemin şart olduğunu savunmuştum.

Steam (ST): But when it came down to it, Father's and Nii-san's answers were exactly the same.
Umineko Project (UP): But the replies I received from Father and my brother were, in summary, exactly the same.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But, if you sum up Father's and brother's answers, they were both the same.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、父と兄の返事はどちらも要約するとまったく同じ。
Russian (RU): Но если сложить ответы отца и брата, то они были одинаковы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas as respostas que eu recebia do pai e de meu irmão, resumindo, eram exatamente as mesmas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，不管是哥還是父親，他們的回答歸納起來都是同一句話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，不管是哥还是父亲，他们的回答归纳起来都是同一句话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma, riassumendo le risposte di mio Padre e di mio fratello, esse coincidevano.
Turkish (TR): Ancak babamdan ve kardeşimden aldığım yanıtlar tamamen aynıydı.

Steam (ST): "How conceited for a woman."
Umineko Project (UP): "How conceited for a woman."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'How conceited for a woman.'
PC Japanese (JP): “女のクセに生意気だ”、だった。
Russian (RU): "Какое высокомерие со стороны женщины."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Quanta pretensão para uma mulher."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “女人家，少臭美”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Quale presunzione per una donna. ’
Turkish (TR): "Ne kadar kibirli bir kadın."

Steam (ST): I've never taken the Ushiromiya name lightly, not once since I was born into it. And I've been even more careful not to take my father's name, Ushiromiya Kinzo, lightly.
Umineko Project (UP): Since the time I was born into the Ushiromiya family, I hadn't taken that name lightly even once. And furthermore, nor had I ever taken lightly Father's name, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since the time I was born into the Ushiromiya family, I hadn't taken that name lightly even once. And furthermore, I also hadn't ever taken Father's name, Ushiromiya Kinzo, lightly even once.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は右代宮の家に生まれたその時から、その名を軽んじたことなど、一度もない。そしてそれ以上に、父である右代宮金蔵の名を軽んじたことなど、ただの一度もない。
Russian (RU): С того момента, как я родилась в семье Уширомия, я ни разу не относилась к этому имени легкомысленно. И более того, я ни разу не отнеслась к имени отца, Уширомия Кинзо, легкомысленно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desde o momento em que eu nasci na família Ushiromiya, eu nunca desmereci esse uma única vez sequer. Além disso, eu nunca menosprezei o nome do meu pai, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我自出生在右代宮家時起，一次都沒有輕視過這個家名。不僅是如此，父親右代宮金藏之名，我也從未輕視過一次。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我自出生在右代宫家时起，一次都没有轻视过这个家名。不仅是如此，父亲右代宫金藏之名，我也从未轻视过一次。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dal giorno in cui nacqui nella famiglia Ushiromiya, non avevo mai preso quel nome alla leggera neppure una volta. E oltre a ciò, non avevo neppure preso il nome di nostro Padre, Ushiromiya Kinzo, alla leggera neppure una volta.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesinde doğduğumdan beri, bu ismi bir kez bile hafife almamıştım. Dahası, babamın adı olan Ushiromiya Kinzo'yu da hiç hafife almamıştım.

Steam (ST): Our family is an old one, with many traditions, but it lost its wealth and businesses in the Great Kanto Earthquake, pushing it to the brink at one point. That was when Father took control with his ingenious talent, reviving it to be even greater than it had been before.
Umineko Project (UP): It was an old family with a long history, but it had lost all its wealth and its business in the Great Kanto Earthquake, and almost sank for a time. Then Father, with his ingenious talent, had taken control, and revived it to be even greater than it had been before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was an old family with many traditions, but in the Great Kanto Earthquake, it had lost its wealth and its business, and had sunk all at once. Then Father, with his ingenious talent, had taken control, and revived it to be even greater than it had been before.
PC Japanese (JP): 伝統ある旧家ではあるが、関東大震災であらゆる財産や事業を失い、一度は傾きかけた。それを父は天才的才能を発揮して、かつて以上に復興させて見せたのだ。
Russian (RU): Семья Уширомия была старой семьёй с множеством традиций, но Великое землетрясение в Канто в один момент лишило её богатства и бизнеса. Тогда отец, наделённый неординарным талантом, получил бразды правления в свои руки и восстановил всё, подняв семью на более высокий уровень, чем прежде.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É uma velha família com uma longa história, mas ela perdeu toda sua riqueza e seus negócios devido ao Grande Terremoto de Kanto, e por um tempo quase se afundou. Foi então que o pai, com todo seu engenhoso talento, assumiu o controle, revivendo a família e deixando ela ainda maior do que antes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這擁有悠久歷史的家族，曾因關東大地震失去了所有錢財產業，一度危在旦夕。但是，父親發揮了天才般的才能，將只剩一口氣的右代宮家復興得比以前還要興盛富強。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这拥有悠久历史的家族，曾因关东大地震失去了所有钱财产业，一度危在旦夕。但是，父亲发挥了天才般的才能，将只剩一口气的右代宫家复兴得比以前还要兴盛富强。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un'antica famiglia con molte tradizioni, ma nel grande terremoto del Kanto, essa aveva perso tutte le sue ricchezze e le sue aziende ed era affondata tutta in una volta. Allora mio Padre, con il suo grande ingegno, ne divenne il capo, e la rivitalizzò facendola diventare ancora più imponente di prima.
Turkish (TR): Köklü bir geçmişe sahip eski bir aileydi, ancak Büyük Kanto Depremi'nde tüm servetini ve işini kaybetmiş ve bir süreliğine neredeyse batmıştı. Daha sonra babam, dahiyane yeteneğiyle kontrolü ele geçirmiş ve eskisinden daha da büyük olacak şekilde yeniden canlandırmıştı.

Steam (ST): Not once did I forget that I was the daughter of that great Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Umineko Project (UP): I hadn't forgotten even once what it meant to be the daughter of that great Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I hadn't forgotten that I was the daughter of that great Ushiromiya Kinzo even once.
PC Japanese (JP): その、偉大なる右代宮金蔵の娘であることの意味を忘れたことなど、ただの一度もない。
Russian (RU): Я ни разу не забывала о том, что была дочерью этого великого Уширомии Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu nunca esqueci sequer uma única vez o que significa ser uma filha do grande Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這身為偉大的右代宮金藏之女的意義，我一次都沒有忘過。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这身为伟大的右代宫金藏之女的意义，我一次都没有忘过。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nemmeno una volta mi ero dimenticata di essere la figlia di quel grandioso Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Turkish (TR): O büyük Ushiromiya Kinzo'nun kızı olmanın ne demek olduğunu bir kez bile olsun unutmamıştım.

Steam (ST): That's why I always made every effort to become worthy of that name.
Umineko Project (UP): Therefore, I had always made every effort to become worthy of that name.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore, I had always made every effort to become worthy of that name.
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ、それに相応しくあろうと私は常に努力してきた。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я всегда прилагала все усилия, чтобы стать достойной этого имени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, eu nunca medi esforços para me tornar digna desse nome.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正因如此，我才時刻為了與此相般配而付出努力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正因如此，我才时刻为了与此相般配而付出努力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Proprio per questo, ho sempre fatto qualunque sforzo per poter portare questo nome.
Turkish (TR): Bu nedenle, her zaman bu isme layık olmak için her türlü çabayı gösterdim.

Steam (ST): I needed dignity worthy of the Ushiromiya family. Schooling. Manners. And leadership.
Umineko Project (UP): Class worthy of the Ushiromiya family. Schooling. Manners. And leadership.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Dignity worthy of the Ushiromiya family. Schooling. Manners. And leadership.
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家に相応しい品格。学力。立ち居振る舞い。そしてリーダーシップ。
Russian (RU): Благородство, достойное семьи Уширомия. Образование. Манеры. И лидерство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dos valores da família Ushiromiya. Escolaridade. Boas maneiras. Liderança.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與右代宮家相稱的品格。學力。坐姿站相。還有領袖才能。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与右代宫家相称的品格。学力。坐姿站相。还有领袖才能。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il decoro degno della famiglia Ushiromiya. Scuola. Maniere. E leadership.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesine yakışır bir mevki. Eğitim. Görgü. Ve liderlik.

Steam (ST): Even if I couldn't quite reach Father's level, I deepened my knowledge in economics and finance, trying to improve myself so I could be of use to him at any time.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if I was far from reaching Father's level, I deepened my knowledge in economics and finance, and tried to improve myself so that I could help out with that at any time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even if I couldn't quite reach Father's level, I deepened my knowledge in economics and finance, and tried to improve myself so that I could help out with that at any time.
PC Japanese (JP): 父には到底及ばなくても、金融や経済に学識を深め、いつでもその手伝いができるよう自分を研磨してきたはずだった。
Russian (RU): Пусть даже я не могла достигнуть уровня отца, я углубляла свои знания в экономике и финансах, стремясь совершенствоваться и стать лучше, чтобы иметь возможность помочь в этих областях в любое время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo que eu esteja longe de alcançar o nível do pai, eu aprofundei meus conhecimentos em economia e finanças, e tentei me aperfeiçoar para ser capaz de ajudar com o que fosse preciso a qualquer momento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 儘管怎麼都比不上父親，但我也理應是積累了許多金融經濟的知識，將自己磨練到隨時都能幫上忙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尽管怎么都比不上父亲，但我也理应是积累了许多金融经济的知识，将自己磨练到随时都能帮上忙。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se non riuscii a raggiungere il livello di mio Padre, approfondii le mie conoscenze in economia e in finanza, e provai a migliorarmi in modo da essere d'aiuto in qualunque momento.
Turkish (TR): Babamın seviyesine ulaşmaktan uzak olsam da, ekonomi ve finans alanındaki bilgilerimi derinleştirerek kendimi geliştirmeye çalıştım, böylece her daim bu konuda yardımcı olabilirdim.

Steam (ST): ...However, in the end, Father never acknowledged my efforts.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, in the end, there never came a time when Father acknowledged that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, in the end, Father never accepted that.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、それが父に認められることはついになかった。
Russian (RU): ......Однако в итоге отец так этого и не принял.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Contudo, acabou que o momento em que o pai me reconheceria nunca chegou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是，父親直到最後都沒有認可我的努力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是，父亲直到最后都没有认可我的努力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma alla fine, mio Padre non lo accettò mai.
Turkish (TR): ......Ancak, neticede babamın bunu kabul ettiği bir zaman asla gelmedi.

Steam (ST): To Father, a woman was only meant to support a man, and nothing further than that was permissable.
Umineko Project (UP): To Father, a woman was only meant to support a man, and nothing further than that was permissible.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): To Father, a woman was only meant to support a man, and nothing further than that was permissable.
PC Japanese (JP): 父にとって、女は男を支えるものでしかなく、それ以上であることを許さなかったからだ。
Russian (RU): По мнению отца, женщине полагалось быть только поддержкой мужчине, и ничего более не дозволялось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para ele, uma mulher serve apenas para ser o suporte de seu marido, e nada mais além disso é permitido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對父親來說，女人只是支撐男人之物，不容再有多餘的舉動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对父亲来说，女人只是支撑男人之物，不容再有多余的举动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per Papà, lo scopo di una donna era solo quello di supportare un uomo, e cose oltre quella non erano permesse.
Turkish (TR): Babama göre bir kadının yalnızca bir erkeğe destek olması gerekiyordu ve bundan ötesine izin verilemezdi.

Steam (ST): When was it that I came to understand that? ...It may have been as early as my childhood years.
Umineko Project (UP): I wonder when it was that I understood that.{n}......I probably understood ever since I was a young girl.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I probably understood that.......I had probably understood that since I was a young girl.
PC Japanese (JP): それを、私はいつ理解したのだろう。……少女時代にはもう、理解していたのかもしれない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを、私はいつ理解したのだろう。{n}……少女時代にはもう、理解していたのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Я, вероятно, понимала это.{n}......Я поняла это когда была ещё совсем юной девушкой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me pergunto quando foi que entendi isso.{n}......Eu provavelmente entendi quando eu ainda era apenas uma garota.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我是在什麼時候，理解到這點的呢。{n}……或許在少女時代，就已經理解了吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我是在什么时候，理解到这点的呢。{n}……或许在少女时代，就已经理解了吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente lo capii. ... Forse l'avevo capito da quando ero piccola.
Turkish (TR): Bunu ne zaman anladığımı merak ediyorum.{n}......Belki de çocukluk yıllarımdan beri.

Steam (ST): ...But, I was going to have to wait until I grew up before I could truly accept it.
Umineko Project (UP): ...But to truly accept it, I had to wait until I had grown up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...But to truly accept that, I had to wait until I had grown up.
PC Japanese (JP): …でも、それを本当の意味で受け容れるには、成人を待たなければならなかった。
Russian (RU): ...Но чтобы по‐настоящему признать это, мне нужно было повзрослеть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas para aceitar verdadeiramente isso, eu precisava esperar até amadurecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過，我卻不得不等到成人之後，才真真正正地接受了這一點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过，我却不得不等到成人之后，才真真正正地接受了这一点。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma per accettarlo sul serio, dovetti aspettare fino all'età adulta.
Turkish (TR): ...Ama bunu gerçekten kabul etmek için büyüyene kadar beklemem gerekti.

Steam (ST): Compared to me, you couldn't have said that Krauss, my older brother of two years, worked hard at all to become deserving of the Ushiromiya family name.
Umineko Project (UP): Compared to my own effort, you couldn't have said that Krauss, as my older brother by two years, tried at all to become deserving of the Ushiromiya family name.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): You couldn't have said that Krauss, as my older brother by two years, tried at all to become deserving of the Ushiromiya family name, and his effort was pathetic compared to mine.
PC Japanese (JP): ２つ年上の兄、蔵臼は、私に比べたらまったくと言っていいほど、右代宮家に相応しくあろうという努力をしているとは言えなかった。
Russian (RU): Нельзя было сказать, что мой брат Краусс, будучи старше меня на два года, прилагал какие‐либо усилия стать достойным семьи Уширомия и его жалкие потуги едва ли можно было сравнить с моими.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Comparado aos meus esforços, você não poderia dizer que o Krauss, meu irmão dois anos mais velho, tentou de tudo para se tornar merecedor do nome da família Ushiromiya.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 年長我兩歲的哥哥藏臼，與我相比的話，簡直可以說，他根本沒在為了與右代宮家相配而付出努力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 年长我两岁的哥哥藏臼，与我相比的话，简直可以说，他根本没在为了与右代宫家相配而付出努力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non si potrebbe dire che Krauss, mio fratello maggiore di due anni, abbia fatto di tutto per meritarsi di portare il nome degli Ushiromiya, e i suoi sforzi furono patetici rispetto ai miei.
Turkish (TR): Benim çabamla kıyaslandığında, iki yaş büyük erkek kardeşim Krauss'un, Ushiromiya ailesinin adını hak etmek için zerre çabaladığını söyleyemezdiniz.

Steam (ST): He told me many times since my early childhood that he would naturally succeed Father, simply because he was born a man.
Umineko Project (UP): Ever since we were young, my brother kept saying that it was natural that he'd succeed Father, just because he was born a man.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since we were young, my brother kept saying that it was natural that he'd succeed Father, just because he was born a man.
PC Japanese (JP): 兄は、自分が男に生まれたというだけで、自分が父の後を継ぐのが当然であると、幼少の頃から何度も口にしてきた。
Russian (RU): Когда мы были молодыми, мой брат постоянно твердил, что он естественно займёт место отца только потому, что был рождён мужчиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desde que éramos jovens, meu irmão sempre disse que era natural que ele sucedesse o pai, apenas porque ele nasceu homem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哥在還是小孩子時起，就經常僅以自己生為男人為由，宣稱自當由他成為父親的後繼者。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哥在还是小孩子时起，就经常仅以自己生为男人为由，宣称自当由他成为父亲的后继者。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poiché eravamo giovani, mio fratello continuava a ripetere che era naturale che lui succedesse a nostro Padre, solo perché era un uomo.
Turkish (TR): Küçüklüğümüzden beri, sırf erkek olarak doğduğu için babamın yerine geçmesinin doğal olduğunu söyleyip dururdu.

Steam (ST): ...He kept on repeating that, as though it formed an uncrossable gap between us.
Umineko Project (UP): ...He kept repeating that, as though it were an absolute gap between us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …それが、私との絶対的な差であるとでも言うように、何度も繰り返してきた。
Russian (RU): ...Он продолжал повторять это, словно между нами была огромная пропасть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ele continuou a repetir isso, como se tivesse uma absoluta lacuna entre nós.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …就像是宣稱，這是我與他的絕對性差距似的，不知反覆說了多少遍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …就像是宣称，这是我与他的绝对性差距似的，不知反复说了多少遍。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Continuava a ripeterlo, come se ci fosse stato un divario assoluto tra noi due.
Turkish (TR): Sanki aramızda mutlak bir uçurum varmış gibi bunu tekrarlayıp dururdu.

Steam (ST): I couldn't stand it. Even though I always got better grades than Nii-san, even though I became class president when he never managed more than vice-president, ...even so, Nii-san was considered to be the appropriate successor to the Ushiromiya family just because he was a man.
Umineko Project (UP): I couldn't stand it. Even though I always got better grades than my brother, even though I became class president while he was stuck as vice‐president of his class, ...even so, my brother was considered to be the appropriate person to succeed the Ushiromiya family, just because he was a man.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I couldn't stand it. Even though I always got better grades than my brother, even though while he was stuck as vice-president of his class, I became class president, ...even so, my brother was considered to be the appropriate person to succeed the Ushiromiya family just because he was a man.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は悔しかった。兄よりも常に良い成績を残しているのに、兄は副会長止まりだった生徒会も、私は会長にまでなったのに、…それでも右代宮家の跡継ぎには男であるというだけの理由で、兄が相応しいとされていたからだ。
Russian (RU): Я не могла этого вынести. Даже при том, что я всегда училась лучше брата, даже при том, что он застрял на посту вице‐президента класса, тогда как я стала президентом... Даже при подобном раскладе мой брат рассматривался как надлежащий наследник семьи Уширомия только потому, что он мужчина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não conseguia suportar isso. Mesmo pensando que eu sempre tirava notas melhores que as dele, mesmo pensando que eu me tornei presidente da turma enquanto ele não passava do vice‐presidente da turma dele, ...mesmo assim, meu irmão sempre se considerou a pessoa apropriada para suceder a família Ushiromiya, apenas porque ele era homem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我十分懊惱。我的成績一直都比哥好，哥只能當到副會長的學生會，我當上了會長，…可儘管如此，右代宮家的繼承人之位，還是僅以一個“得是男人”的理由，成了哥的囊中之物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我十分懊恼。我的成绩一直都比哥好，哥只能当到副会长的学生会，我当上了会长，…可尽管如此，右代宫家的继承人之位，还是仅以一个“得是男人”的理由，成了哥的囊中之物。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non potevo sopportarlo. Anche se prendevo sempre voti migliori dei suoi, anche se io sono diventata rappresentante della mia classe, mentre lui si era bloccato a vice-rappresentante della sua... nonostante ciò, mio fratello era considerato la persona appropriata come capofamiglia solo perché era un uomo.
Turkish (TR): Buna dayanamıyordum. Her zaman ondan daha iyi notlar almış olsam da, o sınıf başkan yardımcısı olarak kalırken ben sınıf başkanı olsam da, ...sırf erkek olduğu için Ushiromiya ailesinin başına geçmesi gereken kişinin o olduğu düşünülüyordu.

Steam (ST): Of course, you could find gender discrimination everywhere in those days. No, it was even considered a virtue in that era.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, you could get away with gender discrimination in those days.{n}No, it was even considered a virtue in those days.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, you could get away with gender discrimination in those days. No, it was even considered a virtue in those days.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに、男女差別が罷り通っていた時代だった。いや、それが美徳とさえされている時代だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 確かに、男女差別が罷り通っていた時代だった。{n}いや、それが美徳とさえされている時代だった。
Russian (RU): Конечно, в те дни половая дискриминация правила бал.{n}Нет, её тогда даже считали достоинством.

Steam (ST): During that despicable time, people said that when a woman is born, she obeys her parents, when she gets married, she obeys her husband, and when she gets old, she obeys her children.

Russian (RU): То было презренное время. Люди считали, что когда рождается женщина, она обязана повиноваться своим родителям, в замужестве она повинуется мужу, а впоследствии в старости — своим детям.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um tempo onde as mulheres eram tratadas como inferiores. Dizem que quando uma mulher nasce, ela deve obedecer seus pais, quando ela casa, deve obedecer seu marido e, quando envelhece deve, obedecer seu filho.

Turkish (TR): Kadınların hor görüldüğü bir dönemdi ve bir kadının doğduğunda anne babasına, evlendiğinde kocasına ve yaşlandığında da çocuklarına itaat etmesi gerektiği söylenirdi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Just as there are roles that only men can fill, there are also roles that can only be filled by women, correct? I do believe giving birth to children, raising them, and supporting the master of the house are roles that can only be filled by women."
Umineko Project (UP): "In the same way that there are things that only men can do, there are also things that only women can do, are there not? I think things like giving birth to children, raising them, and supporting their husband can only be done by women."

PC Japanese (JP): 「男には、男にしか勤められないことがあるように、女とて、女にしか勤められないことがあるんじゃないかね？　子を産み、育て、一家の主を支えるのは、女でなければ出来ぬ勤めだと思うがね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「男には、男にしか務められないことがあるように、女とて、女にしか務められないことがあるんじゃないかね？　子を産み、育て、一家の主を支えるのは、女でなければ出来ぬ務めだと思うがね」
Russian (RU): "Есть вещи, которые могут делать только мужчины и есть вещи, которые могут делать только женщины, верно? Я полагаю, что такие вещи, как рождение ребёнка и его воспитание, а также поддержка мужа могут быть осуществлены только женщинами."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Da mesma forma que existem coisas que só os homens podem fazer, também existem coisas que só as mulheres podem fazer, não acha? Eu acredito que dar à luz a um filho, criá‐lo e dar apoio ao seu marido, são coisas que só podem ser feitas por mulheres."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「就跟男人有只有男人能盡的責一樣，女人，是不是也有只有女人能盡的責呢？生兒育女，支撐一家之主，可是只有女人能盡得到的責任呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「就跟男人有只有男人能尽的责一样，女人，是不是也有只有女人能尽的责呢？生儿育女，支撑一家之主，可是只有女人能尽得到的责任呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Proprio come ci sono cose che possono fare solo gli uomini, ci sono cose che solo le donne possono svolgere, giusto? Penso che cose come dare alla luce i bambini, crescerli, e aiutare il marito possano essere fatte solo dalle donne."

Steam (ST): "I wouldn't go that far. Talking to an unschooled woman is tiring and nothing more. ...However, women are even more tiring when they're too smart. I do believe that a woman as violently assertive as you would bring no end of hardship to her future husband."
Umineko Project (UP): "I wouldn't go that far. Unschooled women are tiring just to talk to. ...However, women who are too smart are even more tiring. I think that a woman like you, who vehemently asserts herself, would cause her future husband a lot of trouble."

Russian (RU): "Я бы не был настолько категоричен. С необразованной женщиной утомительно вести беседу. ...Однако разговор со слишком образованной ещё более утомителен. Я думаю, что такая яростно самоутверждающаяся женщина, как ты, доставит своему мужу в будущем множество проблем."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não iria tão longe. Mulheres sem educação se tornam cansativas até para conversar. ...No entanto, mulheres inteligentes demais são ainda mais cansativas. Eu acho que uma mulher como você, que se afirma veementemente, pode causar muitos problemas ao seu futuro marido."

Kadınların erkekler için hizmet eden köleler olması gerektiğini, kadınların öne çıkmaması gerektiğini mi söylemeye çalışıyorsun?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "It's about knowing one's place. Every day, I have been raised with the readiness of one who will be Head. In the future, that preparation will surely become essential. But you are different. Even though you will marry and lose the Ushiromiya family name, you're being trapped by this unnecessary illusion."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's about whether or not you know your place. Every day, I have been raised so that I would be prepared to be the next head. In the future, that will definitely be essential. But you are different. Even though you will marry and lose the Ushiromiya family name, you keep seeing this illusion that you don't need to see."

Russian (RU): "Суть в том, знаешь ты своё место, или нет . Меня каждый день воспитывали как будущего главу. Это будет определённо необходимо в будущем. Но с тобой иначе. Даже при том, что ты выйдешь замуж и потеряешь фамилию Уширомия, ты видишь иллюзию, которую не нужно видеть."

Anche se ti sposerai e perderai il nome Ushiromiya, continui ad avere questa illusione che non hai bisogno di vedere.

Evlenip Ushiromiya soyadını kaybedecek olmana rağmen, görmene gerek olmayan bu illüzyonu görmeye devam ediyorsun."

Steam (ST): "Dignity isn't the only thing you lack. There's much more. You're immature in everything! And even so, you pretend like you're an adult! Umineko Project (UP): "Dignity isn't the only thing that you lack. There's much more. You're immature in everything! And even so, you pretend like you're an adult! Russian (RU): "Отсутствие достоинства — не единственный твой недостаток. Их гораздо больше. Ты незрелый во всём! И тем не менее ты считаешь себя взрослым! Уясни, что у тебя ещё молоко на губах не обсохло так говорить, и посвяти себя учёбе! Не заставляй меня больше скорбеть из‐за некомпетентности своего сына!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dignidade não é a única coisa que falta em você. Falta muito mais que isso. Você é imaturo em tudo! E mesmo assim, finge ser um adulto! Russian (RU): "Ты всё ещё твердишь об этом?!! Сколько раз я должен сказать, чтобы ты поняла? Твои ожидания — ничто! Женщина должна учиться готовить и шить, как и подобает женщине!!! Sende bir kadın için gerekli olan tutumların hiçbiri yok! Sende, kocasına hizmet etmek, kendini bir erkeğin ihtiyaçlarına içtenlikle adamak için gereken zihniyetten hiçbir iz göremiyorum!!"
