PC Japanese (JP): 生まれつきの、どうにもならない性別を理由に、理不尽な差別に苛まれた。
Russian (RU): Меня терзала эта неблагоразумная дискриминация по принципу разницы полов, присущей людям при рождении, и с которой они ничего не могут поделать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu fui atormentada por essa discriminação irracional por causa do meu sexo, algo que nasceu comigo e eu não posso fazer nada a respeito.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 僅以一個天生的、人自身無法改變的性別為理由，毫無道理地歧視我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仅以一个天生的、人自身无法改变的性别为理由，毫无道理地歧视我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ero tormentata da questa insensata discriminazione sui sessi, qualcosa con cui si nasce e per il quale non si può fare niente.
Turkish (TR): Doğuştan sahip olduğum ve hakkında hiçbir şey yapamadığım cinsiyetim nedeniyle bu mantıksız ayrımcılık bana zulmediyordu.

Steam (ST): I resisted, endeavoring to this very day to study and prove that I'm not inferior, despite being a woman.
Umineko Project (UP): I had resisted, had endeavored to study until today so that I could prove that I wasn't inferior, even though I was a woman.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had resisted, had endeavored to study until today so that I could prove that I wasn't inferior, even though I was a woman.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はそれに反発して、女であっても、何の遜色もない人間になって証明してやろうと今日まで勉強に励んできたのだ。
Russian (RU): До сегодняшнего дня я сопротивлялась и налегала на учёбу в стремлении доказать, что не являюсь низшей по значимости, несмотря на свой пол.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu resisti, me esforcei para estudar até hoje, para que eu pudesse provar que eu não era inferior, mesmo sendo uma mulher.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 反感這一點的我，為了證明就算是女人，也可以絲毫不遜色於男人，而勤奮學習到了今日。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 反感这一点的我，为了证明就算是女人，也可以丝毫不逊色于男人，而勤奋学习到了今日。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Io resistetti, mi sforzai a studiare in modo da provare di non essere inferiore, anche se ero una donna.
Turkish (TR): Bugüne kadar direnmiş, bir kadın da olsam daha aşağı olmadığımı kanıtlayabilmek için çalışmaya özen göstermiştim.

Steam (ST): ...But doesn't that mean my love of learning comes entirely from a stupid complex I've got against Nii-san?
Umineko Project (UP): ...In that case, wasn't the basis of my love of learning just a boring inferiority complex toward my brother?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...In that case, wasn't the basis of my love of learning just a boring complex against my brother?
PC Japanese (JP): …だとしたら、私の向学心の根底は、兄へのつまらぬコンプレックスだけではないか。
Russian (RU): ...В таком случае не зиждилась ли моя любовь к учебе всего лишь на скучном комплексе к моему брату?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Nesse caso, não seria a base do meu amor em aprender apenas um estúpido complexo perante meu irmão?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …那麼，我向學之心的根底，不就只是對哥的無聊的自卑情節嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): …那么，我向学之心的根底，不就只是对哥的无聊的自卑情节吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In questo caso, la base della mia passione per lo studiare era solo un noioso complesso contro mio fratello?
Turkish (TR): ...Bu durumda, öğrenme aşkımın altında yatan şey kardeşime karşı duyduğum aptalca bir aşağılık kompleksi olmuyor muydu?

Steam (ST): Father wanted me to become a lady with whom he could go out in public and not be embarrassed.
Umineko Project (UP): Father had expected me to be a lady with whom he could go out in public and not be embarrassed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 父は私に、社交界へ連れて行っても恥ずかしくないレディを期待した。
Russian (RU): Отец ожидал, что я стану леди, с которой он, не стыдясь, мог бы выйти в общество.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Meu pai tinha expectativas de que eu me tornasse uma dama com a qual ele pudesse sair junto em público sem ficar envergonhado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 父親期望我成為一位，即便帶進社交界，也不會丟人現眼的淑女。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 父亲期望我成为一位，即便带进社交界，也不会丢人现眼的淑女。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nostro Padre si aspettava che io fossi una gentildonna, con la quale sarebbe uscito in pubblico senza imbarazzo.
Turkish (TR): Babam benden, birlikte insan içine çıkabileceği ve utanmayacağı bir hanımefendi olmamı beklemişti.

Steam (ST): ...Did I betray his hopes, earning good grades and threating Nii-san just to satisfy a childhood resentment...?
Umineko Project (UP): ...Had I betrayed that expectation and earned grades to intimidate my brother just to clear away that pent‐up resentment from my childhood...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Had I betrayed that expectation and earned grades to threaten my brother just to clear away that pent up resentment...?
PC Japanese (JP): …それを私が裏切って、兄を脅かす成績を当て付け、幼少の頃の恨み辛みを晴らしていただけ…？
Russian (RU): ...Неужели я предала его ожидания и зарабатывала оценки лучше, чем у брата, чтобы лишь избавиться от накопившихся негодования, возмущения и обиды?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eu teria traído essa expectativa dele e somado notas para intimidar meu irmão apenas para curar meu ressentimento reprimido de infância...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我違背了爸的期望，只是在通過以成績譏諷哥，來報幼年時的憤恨辛酸之仇而已嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我违背了爸的期望，只是在通过以成绩讥讽哥，来报幼年时的愤恨辛酸之仇而已吗…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Avevo tradito quell'aspettativa ed ero salita di gradi per minacciare mio fratello solo per spazzare via quel rancore represso...?
Turkish (TR): ...Bu beklentiye ihanet etmiş ve sırf çocukluğumdan kalma bastırılmış hıncımı gidermek için kardeşimin gözünü korkutacak notlar mı almıştım...?

Steam (ST): "That's not it. You swore to me, saying "I will become the successor to the Ushiromiya family"."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's not it. You vowed to me that I would become the successor to the Ushiromiya family."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's not it. You swore to me, saying 'I will become the successor to the Ushiromiya family'."
PC Japanese (JP): 「違うわ。私が右代宮家の跡継ぎになるんだって、あなたは私に誓ったわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「違うわ。私が右代宮家の跡継ぎになるんだって、あなたは私に誓ったわ」
Russian (RU): "Нет, не так. Ты поклялась мне, сказав: 'Я стану наследником семьи Уширомия'."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não é isso. Você jurou para mim que eu me tornaria a sucessora da família Ushiromiya."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「錯。我要成為右代宮家的繼承人，你向我發過誓的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「错。我要成为右代宫家的继承人，你向我发过誓的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non è così. Me l'hai promesso: ‘Io diventerò il capofamiglia Ushiromiya’."
Turkish (TR): "Yanlış. Bana Ushiromiya ailesinin halefi olacağıma dair söz vermiştin."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): The one whispering to me......was the "me" of my years as a young girl, born inside my heart on the day I made that oath.
Umineko Project (UP): The one who came whispering to me.........was myself, born in my heart on the day I made that vow—myself on that day as a little girl.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The one who came up to me, whispering, .........was the me of my days as a young girl, who had been born inside my heart on the day that I swore that.
PC Japanese (JP): 囁き掛けてきたのは、………そう誓った日に私の心の中に生まれた、あの少女の日の私だった。
Russian (RU): Подошедшей ко мне и прошептавшей мне... была я в дни своей юности, родившаяся в моем сердце после принесения той клятвы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquela que veio até mim para sussurrar.........eu mesma, nascida em meu coração no dia que fiz aquele juramento — a eu de quando era apenas uma garotinha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 悄聲對我說話的，………是在發下這個誓言的那一天，從我心中誕生的，少女時的我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 悄声对我说话的，………是在发下这个誓言的那一天，从我心中诞生的，少女时的我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Colei che venne da me, sussurrando... era la me dei miei giorni da giovane ragazza, che era nata dal mio cuore il giorno in cui l'avevo promesso.
Turkish (TR): Bana fısıldayan kişi.........yemini ettiğim o gün kalbimin içinde doğmuş olan—genç kızlık yıllarımdaki—bendim.

Steam (ST): ...That's right. "She" was my only ally.
Umineko Project (UP): ...That's right. "She" was my only ally.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...That's right. 'She' was my only ally.
PC Japanese (JP): …そう。“彼女”は、私の唯一の味方だった。
Russian (RU): ...Точно. "Она" была моей единственной союзницей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Isso mesmo. "Ela" é minha única aliada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …對。“她”，是我唯一的伙伴。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …对。“她”，是我唯一的伙伴。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Già. ‘Lei’ era la mia unica alleata.
Turkish (TR): ...Bu doğru. "O" benim tek müttefikimdi.

Steam (ST): When things got difficult, when I felt like I was about to get crushed by it all, she would always quietly appear and support me.
Umineko Project (UP): Whenever I was suffering, whenever I felt like I could take no more, she would always quietly appear and take my side.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When things got difficult, when I felt broken, she would always quietly appear and become my ally.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が辛い時、挫けそうな時、いつもそっと現れて私に味方してくれた。
Russian (RU): Когда мне становилось тяжело, когда я чувствовала себя разбитой, она всегда тихо возникала рядом со мной и становилась моей союзницей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sempre que eu sofria, sempre que eu sentia que não iria mais aguentar, ela sempre apareceu silenciosamente e ficou ao meu lado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在我傷心時、想要放棄時，她總是會現身安慰我、支持我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在我伤心时、想要放弃时，她总是会现身安慰我、支持我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando le cose si facevano difficili, quando mi sentivo distrutta, lei appariva sempre silenziosamente e diventava la mia alleata.
Turkish (TR): Ne zaman acı çeksem, ne zaman daha fazla dayanamayacağımı hissetsem, her zaman sessizce ortaya çıkar ve benim yanımda olurdu.

Steam (ST): When I ran into roadblocks and despaired, she would always appear and support me.
Umineko Project (UP): Whenever I found myself with my head in my hands, stumbling over difficult problems, she would always appear and support me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I stumbled over difficulties, and was greatly troubled, she would always appear and support me.
PC Japanese (JP): 難問に躓き、頭を抱えた時には必ず現れて応援してくれた。
Russian (RU): Когда я сталкивалась с трудностями, доставлявшими мне изрядно хлопот, она всегда появлялась и поддерживала меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sempre que eu me encontrava desesperada com as mãos na cabeça, cambaleando sobre problemas difíceis, ela sempre aparecia e me apoiava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在我因難題受挫、抱頭苦思時，她必定會出現，給我打氣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在我因难题受挫、抱头苦思时，她必定会出现，给我打气。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando incontravo delle difficoltà, ed ero in grossi guai, lei appariva sempre e mi supportava.
Turkish (TR): Ne zaman kendimi başımı ellerimin arasına almış, zor sorunlar karşısında tökezlerken bulsam, her zaman ortaya çıkar ve bana destek olurdu.

Steam (ST): When I grew up and the memories of my childhood years faded, I also started to forget my conversations with "her"...
Umineko Project (UP): As I had grown and forgotten my time as a girl, I'd also begun to forget my conversations with "her"...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As I had grown and forgotten my time as a girl, I'd also begun to forget my conversations with 'her'...
PC Japanese (JP): 私が成長し、少女時代を忘れるに従い、私は“彼女”との対話を次第に忘れていった…。
Russian (RU): Став старше, я забыла свою бытность девочкой, а заодно стала забывать свои разговоры с "ней"...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eu cresci e esqueci dos meus tempos de garota, eu também comecei a esquecer das minhas conversas com "ela"...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 隨著成長，我忘記了少女時代，也漸漸地忘記了我與“她”的對話…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着成长，我忘记了少女时代，也渐渐地忘记了我与“她”的对话…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come crebbi e mi dimenticai del tempo passato da ragazza, iniziai a dimenticare anche le conversazioni con ‘lei’...
Turkish (TR): Büyüdükçe ve genç bir kız olduğum zamanları unuttukça, "onunla" olan konuşmalarımı da unutmaya başlamıştım...

Steam (ST): "I, Ushiromiya Eva, will definitely become the Head of the Ushiromiya family. And I'll triumph over that irritating, arrogant Krauss. ...On that day, we promised to do our best together to achieve that."
Umineko Project (UP): "I, Ushiromiya Eva, will definitely become the head of the Ushiromiya family. And I'll triumph over that irritating, arrogant Krauss. ...On that day, we promised to do our best together to achieve that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「私、右代宮絵羽は、絶対に右代宮家の当主になるの。そしてあのムカつく高慢ちきな蔵臼を見返してやるの。…その為に一緒にがんばろうって、あの日、私たちは約束したわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私、右代宮絵羽は、絶対に右代宮家の当主になるの。そしてあのムカつく高慢ちきな蔵臼を見返してやるの。…その為に一緒にがんばろうって、あの日、私たちは約束したわ」
Russian (RU): "Я, Уширомия Ева, непременно стану главой семьи Уширомия. И я восторжествую над этим вызывающим раздражение, заносчивым и высокомерным Крауссом. ...В тот день мы пообещали стараться изо всех сил, чтобы достичь этой цели."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu, Ushiromiya Eva, definitivamente irei me tornar a chefe da família Ushiromiya. E irei triunfar sobre aquele insuportável e arrogante do Krauss. ...Naquele dia, nós prometemos fazer o nosso melhor para conseguirmos isso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我，右代宮繪羽，絕對要當上右代宮家的當主。然後向那可氣傲慢的藏臼還以顏色。…在那天，我們約好了，要為此一起努力的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我，右代宫绘羽，绝对要当上右代宫家的当主。然后向那可气傲慢的藏臼还以颜色。…在那天，我们约好了，要为此一起努力的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Io, Ushiromiya Eva, diverrò assolutamente il capo della famiglia Ushiromiya. {n}E trionferò su quell'irritante, arrogante Krauss. ... Quel giorno, promettemmo di fare del nostro meglio insieme per raggiungere quel risultato."
Turkish (TR): "Ben, Ushiromiya Eva, kesinlikle Ushiromiya ailesinin reisi olacağım. Ve o sinir bozucu, kendini beğenmiş Krauss'a karşı galip geleceğim. ...O gün, bunu başarmak için birlikte elimizden gelenin en iyisini yapacağımıza dair söz vermiştik."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...That's right, we promised. ...On that day, I promised that I would become the successor to the Ushiromiya Headship."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's right. We promised. ...On that day, that I would become the successor to the head."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......That's right, we promised. ...On that day, that I would become the successor to the head."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうね。約束したわ。…私は右代宮家の当主跡継ぎになるって、あの日にね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうね。約束したわ。…私は右代宮家の当主跡継ぎになるって、あの日にね」
Russian (RU): "......Да, пообещали. ...Тогда было дано обещание, что я стану наследником главы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso mesmo. Nós prometemos. ...Naquele dia, prometi que iria me tornar a sucessora do chefe."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是的。在那天。…是約定過，要成為右代宮家當主的繼承人。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是的。在那天。…是约定过，要成为右代宫家当主的继承人。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Giusto, lo promettemmo. ... In quel giorno, che io sarei diventata il nuovo capo."
Turkish (TR): "......Doğru. Söz vermiştik. ...O gün, Ushiromiya reisinin halefi olacağıma söz vermiştik."

Steam (ST): On that day, when I had been overcome with sadness, wondering why I was even alive, ...you appeared from inside me and lent me your strength.
Umineko Project (UP): On that day, when I had been overcome with sadness, wondering why I was even alive, ...you appeared inside me, and lent me your strength.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 悲しみに沈み、何の為に生きるのかわからなくなったあの日、…あなたは私の内より現れて、私に力を貸してくれたわ。
Russian (RU): В тот день, когда печаль захватила меня, заставив гадать, почему я вообще живу... ты возникла во мне и поделилась со мной своею силой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele dia, quando eu fui consumida pela tristeza, me perguntando por que eu estava viva, ...você apareceu dentro de mim e me emprestou sua força.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在沉浸進悲傷之中，連為何而活都不知道了的那一天，…你在我心中出現，借予了我振作起來的力量。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在沉浸进悲伤之中，连为何而活都不知道了的那一天，…你在我心中出现，借予了我振作起来的力量。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel giorno, quando ero piena di tristezza, chiedendomi perché fossi ancora viva... tu apparisti dentro di me, e mi desti la tua forza.
Turkish (TR): O gün, üzüntüye yenik düşüp, neden hâlâ yaşadığımı düşünürken, ...içimde belirdin ve bana gücünü ödünç verdin.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...Father didn't accept me. I wanted to teach Nii-san a lesson. I believed that doing this...would let me say goodbye to the wretched creature I once was."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I wanted Father to accept me. I wanted to get the better of my brother. I believed that, if I could do that, I could forever part ways with that wretched part of myself."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......I wasn't accepted by Father. I wanted to take advantage of Nii-san's weakness. I believed that, if I could do that, I could distinguish my wretched self."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お父様に認められたかった。兄さんの鼻を明かしてやりたかった。そうすれば、惨めな自分に決別ができると信じていたわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……お父様に認められたかった。兄さんの鼻を明かしてやりたかった。そうすれば、惨めな自分に決別ができると信じていたわ」
Russian (RU): "......Мой отец не принял меня. Я хотела извлечь пользу из слабостей нии‐сана. Я полагала, что сделав это, я смогу отделить жалкую и гнусную часть себя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu quero que o pai me reconheça. Eu quero ser melhor que o meu irmão.{n}Eu acredito que, se eu puder fazer isso, eu poderei me separar para sempre dessa parte miserável de mim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……想獲得爸的認可。想把哥嚇傻。一直相信，這麼做了，就能和悲慘的自己訣別。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……想获得爸的认可。想把哥吓傻。一直相信，这么做了，就能和悲惨的自己诀别。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Io non ero accettata da mio Padre. Volevo trarre vantaggio dalla debolezza di Nii-san. Credetti che, se l'avessi potuto fare, avrei potuto mettere in evidenza la mia personalità disgraziata."
Turkish (TR): "......Babamın beni kabul etmesini istedim. Kardeşimi alt etmek istedim. Eğer bunu yapabilirsem, içimdeki o acınası yanımla yollarımı sonsuza dek ayırabileceğime inanıyordum."

Steam (ST): For a time, I truly believed that my life had no purpose other than to be looked down upon by Nii-san.
Umineko Project (UP): In those days, I had really believed that I had no other purpose in life than to be looked down upon by my brother.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In those days, I had really believed that my life had no purpose other than to be looked down upon by my brother.
PC Japanese (JP): 私の人生は、兄に見下されるためにあると本気で信じた日々があった。
Russian (RU): В те дни я действительно полагала, что моя жизнь предназначена лишь для того, чтобы мой брат смотрел на меня с высока.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naqueles dias, eu realmente acreditava que não possuía nenhum outro propósito na vida além de ser tratada como inferior pelo meu irmão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 有一段日子，我真的相信：自己的人生，就是為了被哥小瞧而存在的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 有一段日子，我真的相信：自己的人生，就是为了被哥小瞧而存在的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quei giorni, avevo realmente creduto che la mia vita non aveva altro scopo che essere disprezzata da mio fratello.
Turkish (TR): O günlerde, hayatta erkek kardeşim tarafından hor görülmekten başka bir işim olmadığına gerçekten inanmıştım.

Steam (ST): ...It's painful just remembering those days. They're a wound, a crack inside my heart...
Umineko Project (UP): ...It's painful just remembering those days.{n}The wound, the tear that split open in my heart...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It's painful just remembering those days. The fate that went into my heart and tore a hole in me...
PC Japanese (JP): …それは思い出すだけで苦々しい日々。私の心に入った、傷の裂け目…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …それは思い出すだけで苦々しい日々。{n}私の心に入った、傷の裂け目…。
Russian (RU): ...Больно даже просто вспоминать эти дни.{n}Судьбу, ворвавшуюся в моё сердце и прорвавшую дыру во мне...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...É doloroso relembrar aqueles dias.{n}A ferida, as lágrimas que partiam meu coração...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …那是一段，光是想起來就感到痛苦的日子。{n}是我心上，傷口的裂縫…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …那是一段，光是想起来就感到痛苦的日子。{n}是我心上，伤口的裂缝…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il solo ricordare questi giorni è doloroso. Il destino che andò nel mio cuore e creò una fossa in me...
Turkish (TR): ...Sadece o günleri hatırlamak bile acı verici.{n}Kalbimdeki bu yara, bu yırtık...

Steam (ST): "She" taught me how to sew up that wound...
Umineko Project (UP): "She" taught me how to sew up that wound...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'She' had taught me how to sew up that wound...
PC Japanese (JP): その傷の縫い方を、“彼女”は教えてくれた…。
Russian (RU): "Она" научила меня, как заштопать эту рану...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ela" me ensinou como costurar essa ferida...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “她”，教給了我縫起傷口的方法…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “她”，教给了我缝起伤口的方法…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Lei’ mi aveva insegnato come guarire quella ferita...
Turkish (TR): "O" bana bu yarayı nasıl iyileştireceğimi öğretti.

Steam (ST): I turned my anger into effort and improved myself, ...trying to become a person more worthy of the Headship than Krauss was, trying to triumph over him by making Father accept me. It was my perfect revenge.
Umineko Project (UP): I would change my anger into effort and improve myself, ......become a person more worthy to be head than Krauss was, and triumph over him by making Father accept me—the perfect revenge.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I had changed my anger into effort and improved myself, ......to become a person more worthy to be head than Krauss was, and to triumph over him by making Father accept me. The perfect revenge.
PC Japanese (JP): 怒りを、努力に換えて自分を磨き、……兄よりも当主に相応しい人間になって、それをお父様に認めさせることで見返そうという、最高の形の復讐。
Russian (RU): Я преобразила свою злость в силу и усовершенствовала себя... чтобы стать более достойным, чем Краусс, человеком на место главы и восторжествовать над ним, заставив отца принять меня. Идеальная месть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu deveria transformar minha raiva em esforços para melhorar a mim mesma, ......me tornar uma pessoa mais digna, que o Krauss para ser a chefe da família,{n}e triunfar sobre ele fazendo o pai me aceitar. Seria a vingança perfeita.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 化憤怒為努力，磨練自己，……成為比哥更配成為當主的人，然後再通過讓爸認可此，來構成最高形式的復仇。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 化愤怒为努力，磨练自己，……成为比哥更配成为当主的人，然后再通过让爸认可此，来构成最高形式的复仇。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avevo trasformato la mia rabbia in sforzo e mi migliorai... per diventare una persona più valida di Krauss per essere il capo, e per trionfare su di lui facendomi accettare da mio Padre. La vendetta perfetta.
Turkish (TR): Öfkemi çabaya dönüştürüp kendimi geliştirecek, ......Krauss'tan daha değerli bir insan olacak, ve babamın beni kabul etmesini sağlayarak ona karşı zafer kazanacaktım. Mükemmel bir intikam.

Steam (ST): I was vaguely aware that a woman couldn't possibly become the Family Head.
Umineko Project (UP): I knew more or less that a woman couldn't succeed the head.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I knew more or less that a woman couldn't succeed the head.
PC Japanese (JP): 女は当主を継げないことは薄々知っていた。
Russian (RU): Я более или менее знала о невозможности унаследовать пост главы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu vagamente sabia que uma mulher não poderia suceder o chefe da família.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我隱隱約約地知道女人不能繼任當主。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我隐隐约约地知道女人不能继任当主。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Più o meno sapevo che una donna non avrebbe potuto succedere al capo.
Turkish (TR): Bir kadının reis olamayacağını az çok biliyordum.

Steam (ST): But I thought that maybe, if I could prove myself valuable enough to overturn that premise, ...then surely even Father would select me to be his successor.
Umineko Project (UP): But if I could become so superior that I could overturn that, ...then surely even Father would select me to be his successor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But maybe, if I tried to become so superior that I could overturn that, ...then surely even Father would select me to be his successor.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、それを覆させるほどに自分を優秀にして見せれば、…きっとお父様も私を跡継ぎに選んでくれるだろう。
Russian (RU): Но вдруг, попытайся я стать настолько превосходной, что смогу пересилить это мнение, то тогда наверняка даже отец выберет меня в качестве своей наследницы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas se eu pudesse me tornar tão superior a ponto de superar isso, ...então o pai certamente me escolheria para ser a sua sucessora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，只要我優秀到能將此推翻，…爸也一定會選我為繼承人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，只要我优秀到能将此推翻，…爸也一定会选我为继承人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma forse, se provassi a diventare tanto superiore da rompere quella regola... allora perfino mio Padre eleggerebbe sicuramente me come suo successore.
Turkish (TR): Ama bunu tersine çevirebilecek kadar başarılı olabilseydim, ...o zaman Babam bile beni halefi olarak seçebilirdi.

Steam (ST): If that happened, ...then I'd be able to have the greatest and most perfect revenge against Nii-san, who always acted like his succession to the Headship was completely inevitable...
Umineko Project (UP): If that happened, ......then I could have the greatest, ultimate, most perfect revenge against my brother, who always acted like it was completely natural for him to succeed the head...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If that happened, ......then I could have the greatest and most perfect revenge against my brother, who always acted like it was completely natural for him to succeed the head...
PC Japanese (JP): そうすれば、……当主を受け継ぐのがさも当然であるかのように振舞ってきた兄さんを、最大最高最善の形で、復讐することができるのだ…。
Russian (RU): Случись это... тогда свершилась бы величайшая и идеальнейшая месть моему брату, который постоянно вел себя так, будто для него естественно унаследовать титул главы семьи...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se isso acontecesse, ......então eu teria a maior, melhor e mais perfeita vingança contra meu irmão, que sempre agiu como se fosse completamente natural para ele suceder o chefe da família...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這樣一來，……我就能以最大最棒最完美的形式，向一直擺出副理應由他繼承當主的樣子的哥，復仇…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这样一来，……我就能以最大最棒最完美的形式，向一直摆出副理应由他继承当主的样子的哥，复仇…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se succedesse ciò... allora potrei avere la più grande e perfetta vendetta contro mio fratello, che agiva sempre come se fosse completamente naturale per lui succedere al capo...
Turkish (TR): Eğer böyle bir şey gerçekleşirse, reis olması her zaman çok doğalmış gibi davranan kardeşimden en büyük, en nihai, en mükemmel intikamı alabilirdim...

Steam (ST): "That's right. If we can manage that, the wounds in our heart will be healed. ...We promised each other to do our best until that day comes.
Umineko Project (UP): "Right. If we do that, then the wounds in our heart will be healed. ......We promised each other that we would do our best until that day came."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Right. If we do that, then the wounds in our heart will be healed. ......We promised each other that we would do our best until that day comes.
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。そうすれば私たちの心の傷は癒えるの。……その日までがんばろうって、誓い合ったわ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。そうすれば私たちの心の傷は癒えるの。……その日までがんばろうって、誓い合ったわ」
Russian (RU): "Правильно. Если мы это сделаем, нанесённые нашему сердцу раны затянутся. ......Мы пообещали друг другу, что будем стараться изо всех сил, пока этот день не наступит."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Certo. Se fizermos isso, então as feridas em nossos corações serão curadas. ......Nós prometemos uma à outra que iríamos fazer o nosso melhor até que esse dia chegasse."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。這樣一來，我們的心傷就能癒合。……我們互相起誓了，在這天來臨前一起努力。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。这样一来，我们的心伤就能愈合。……我们互相起誓了，在这天来临前一起努力。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Giusto. Se facciamo così, le ferite nel nostro cuore saranno curate. ... Abbiamo promesso reciprocamente di fare del nostro meglio finché quel giorno non verrà.
Turkish (TR): "Evet. Eğer bunu başarırsak, kalbimizdeki yaralar iyileşecek. ......O gün gelinceye dek elimizden gelenin en iyisini yapacağımıza dair birbirimize söz verdik."

Steam (ST): And now you're saying you're gonna break that promise? Scum. Coward. If only you'd just give up and die..."
Umineko Project (UP): "And yet, you're breaking this promise? Scum. Coward. Why not give up and die forever...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, you're breaking this promise? Scum. Coward. Why don't you just {c:86EF9C:give up and die}...?"
PC Japanese (JP): なのに、あなたはその約束を破るの？　クズ。意気地なし。ヘソ噛んで死んじゃえば…？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「なのに、あなたはその約束を破るの？　クズ。意気地なし。ヘソ噛んで死んじゃえば…？」
Russian (RU): "И вдруг ты нарушаешь это обещание? Мразь. Трусиха. Почему бы тебе просто не сдаться и сдохнуть, а?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E mesmo assim, você está quebrando a promessa? Escória. Covarde. Por que não desiste e morre bem {i:devagar}...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「可是你，竟然要打破這約定？渣滓。沒骨氣。{c:86EF9C:咬破肚臍去死如何}…？{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書同名條目）}」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「可是你，竟然要打破这约定？渣滓。没骨气。{c:86EF9C:咬破肚脐去死如何}…？{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书同名条目）}」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E nonostante ciò tu stai rompendo questa promessa? Feccia. Codarda. Perché non {c:86EF9C:ti rassegni e muori}...?"
Turkish (TR): "Ve yine de, bu sözü bozuyor musun? Pislik. Korkak. Neden pes edip ölmüyorsun...?"

Steam (ST): Even though she looked like me as a kid, she was still another me. ...Her tongue was sharp because it was mine.
Umineko Project (UP): Even though she has the form of my young self, she is still another me. ...And she has a sharp tongue—after all, she's me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though she had the form of my young self, she was another me. ...Anyway, since she was me, she had a sharp tongue.
PC Japanese (JP): 少女時代の姿をしているとは言え、それはもうひとりの私。…何しろ、私なのだから口が悪い。
Russian (RU): И хотя на вид она была юная я, она была другая я. ...И поскольку она была мною, то имела острый язык.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo ela sendo a minha forma mais jovem, ela ainda era uma outra eu. ...E ela tinha uma língua afiada. Afinal, era {i:eu}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說外表是少女時代的樣子，但她是另一個我。…畢竟因為是我，所以嘴巴很臭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说外表是少女时代的样子，但她是另一个我。…毕竟因为是我，所以嘴巴很臭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se aveva la forma di me da giovane, era un'altra me stessa. ... Comunque, poiché era me, aveva la lingua biforcuta.
Turkish (TR): Her ne kadar benim genç halimin formuna sahip olsa da, o yine de başka bir ben. ...Ve sivri bir dili var—ne de olsa o benim.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...It makes me pretty mad hearing that, even from myself. You have no right to speak of me like that."
Umineko Project (UP): "...It really makes me mad hearing that from myself. You have no right to speak of me like that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…自分に言われても腹が立つわね。そこまでボロクソに言われる筋合いはないわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…自分に言われても腹が立つわね。そこまでボロクソに言われる筋合いはないわ」
Russian (RU): "...Как же меня злит слышать такое от самой себя. Ты не имеешь права так со мной разговаривать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Eu mesma fico louca de ouvir isso de mim mesma. Você não tem o direito de falar dessas forma comigo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…被自己罵也照樣來氣。我可沒理由被你罵得這麼一錢不值。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…被自己骂也照样来气。我可没理由被你骂得这么一钱不值。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sentire queste cose da me stessa mi fa davvero arrabbiare. Non hai diritto di parlare a me in questo modo."
Turkish (TR): "...Bunu kendimden duymak beni gerçekten kızdırıyor. Benim hakkımda böyle konuşmaya hakkın yok."

Steam (ST): "Then let's use that anger to fuel our learning. ...Changing anger into power is my magic. I've saved you from a bunch of tight spots with that power, letting you to succeed when you shouldn't have. As long as you have my magic, there's nothing you can't do."
Umineko Project (UP): "Then let's use that anger and learn from it. ......Changing anger into power is my magic. I've saved you from several predicaments with that power, and allowed you to achieve things that should have been impossible for you. As long as you have my magic, there's nothing you can't do."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then let's use that anger and learn from it. ......Changing anger into power is my magic. I've saved you from several predicaments with that power, and allowed you to succeed where you shouldn't have succeeded. As long as you have my magic, there's nothing you can't do."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ならば、その怒りを勉強に費やしましょうよ。……怒りを力に換えるのが私の魔法。この力で、何度もあなたの窮地を救い、あなたは成せないはずのことを成し遂げてきた。私の魔法がある限り、あなたに出来ないことなど有りはしないわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ならば、その怒りを勉強に費やしましょうよ。……怒りを力に換えるのが私の魔法。この力で、何度もあなたの窮地を救い、あなたは成せないはずのことを成し遂げてきた。私の魔法がある限り、あなたに出来ないことなど有りはしないわ」
Russian (RU): "Тогда давай воспользуемся этой злостью и извлечём из неё урок. ......Моя магия заключается в преображении злости и гнева в силу. При помощи этой силы я выручила тебя в нескольких затруднительных ситуациях и позволила добиться успеха там, где ты не должна была его добиться. Пока с тобой будет моя магия — не будет ничего, что ты не могла бы сделать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então vamos usar essa raiva, aprender com ela. ......Transformar raiva em poder é a minha magia. Eu já salvei você de diversas dificuldades com esse poder, e também permiti que você alcançasse coisas que deveriam ser impossíveis para você. Enquanto tiver a minha magia, não há nada que você não possa fazer."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，就把這憤怒花在學習上啊。……化憤怒為力量是我的魔法。這種力量多次幫助你擺脫了困境，讓你做成了原本無法做成之事。只要有我的魔法在，你就根本沒有做不到的事。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，就把这愤怒花在学习上啊。……化愤怒为力量是我的魔法。这种力量多次帮助你摆脱了困境，让你做成了原本无法做成之事。只要有我的魔法在，你就根本没有做不到的事。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Allora usiamo quella rabbia e impariamo da quella. ... La mia magia è trasformare la collera in forza. Ti ho salvato da diverse situazioni difficili, e ti ho permesso di riuscire in quello in cui non avresti dovuto riuscire. Finché hai la mia magia, non c'è nulla che tu non possa fare."
Turkish (TR): "O zaman bu öfkeyi kullanalım ve bundan faydalanalım. ......Öfkeyi güce dönüştürmek benim büyüm. Bu güçle seni birçok çıkmazdan kurtardım ve senin için imkansız olması gereken şeyleri başarmanı sağladım. Benim büyüme sahip olduğun sürece, başaramayacağın hiçbir şey yok."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...That's right. Anger has always been my driving force. I wonder when it was I forgot that..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's right. Anger has always been my driving force. I wonder when it was that I forgot that..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうね。怒りはいつも私の原動力だったわ。いつからそれを忘れてしまったのかしら…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうね。怒りはいつも私の原動力だったわ。いつからそれを忘れてしまったのかしら…」
Russian (RU): "......Точно. Злость всегда была моей движущей силой. Интересно, когда же я об этом забыла..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso mesmo. A raiva sempre foi a força que me moveu. Eu me pergunto quando foi que me esqueci disso...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是呢。憤怒一直都是我的原動力。我是在什麼時候把這給忘了呢…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呢。愤怒一直都是我的原动力。我是在什么时候把这给忘了呢…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Già. La rabbia è sempre stata la forza che mi ha guidato. Mi chiedo quand'è che l'ho dimenticato..."
Turkish (TR): "......Bu doğru. Öfke her zaman beni harekete geçiren bir güç oldu. Acaba bunu ne zaman unuttum..."

Steam (ST): "If you can remember me again, that magic will become ours once more. Come on, let's turn that anger into power and study even harder, okay? I know we've still got a lot to learn."
Umineko Project (UP): "If you have remembered me again, that magic is ours once more. Come on, let's turn that anger into power, and endeavor in our studies even more, alright? I'm sure that we still have a lot more studying that we need to do."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If you can remember me again, that magic will become ours once more. Come on, let's turn that anger into power, and endeavor in our studies even more, alright? I'm sure that we still need to study a lot more.
PC Japanese (JP): 「私を思い出せたなら、あの魔法の力は再び私たちのもの。さぁ、その怒りを力に換えて、もっともっと勉強に励みましょう？　きっと、私たちにはまだまだ勉強が足りないのよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私を思い出せたなら、あの魔法の力は再び私たちのもの。さぁ、その怒りを力に換えて、もっともっと勉強に励みましょう？　きっと、私たちにはまだまだ勉強が足りないのよ」
Russian (RU): "Если вновь вспомнишь меня, эта магия снова станет нашей. Ну же, давай превратим эту злость в силу и приложим ещё больше сил в обучении, ладно? Уверена, нам нужно будет научиться ещё много чему."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se você se lembrar de mim novamente, a magia mais uma vez será sua. Vamos, vamos transformar essa raiva em poder, e então vamos nos empenhar em nossos estudos ainda mais, o que acha? Eu tenho certeza que ainda tem muita coisa que precisamos estudar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「既然把我想起來了，那這魔法之力就再度成為了我們的東西。來，將憤怒化為力量，更加更加地勤奮學習吧？我們一定還學得遠遠不夠喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「既然把我想起来了，那这魔法之力就再度成为了我们的东西。来，将愤怒化为力量，更加更加地勤奋学习吧？我们一定还学得远远不够哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se puoi ricordarmi ancora, quella magia diventerà ancora una vota nostra. {n}Su, trasformiamo quell'impeto in forza, e gli sforzi nei nostri studi, ancora di più, va bene? Sono sicura che abbiamo bisogno di studiare ancora di più.
Turkish (TR): "Eğer beni tekrar hatırladıysan, bu büyü bir kez daha bizim demektir. Hadi, bu öfkeyi güce dönüştürelim ve yaptığımız çalışmalara daha fazla gayret gösterelim, tamam mı? Daha yapmamız gereken çok şey olduğuna eminim."

Steam (ST): "Let's go to college, study more and more, get excellent grades, and drive Krauss into a corner.
Umineko Project (UP): "Let's go to college, study more and more, get excellent grades, and drive Krauss into a corner."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Let's go to college, study more and more, get excellent grades, and drive Krauss into a corner.
PC Japanese (JP): 大学院に進んで、もっといっぱい勉強して、優れた成績を出して、蔵臼を追い詰めてやりましょう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「大学院に進んで、もっといっぱい勉強して、優れた成績を出して、蔵臼を追い詰めてやりましょう」
Russian (RU): "Давай поступим в колледж, будем ещё больше учиться, получать великолепные оценки и загоним Краусса в угол."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamos para a universidade, estudar mais e mais, tirar excelentes notas e encurralar o Krauss."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「進入研究生院，再去學好多好多東西，拿出優秀的成績，來刺激藏臼。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「进入研究生院，再去学好多好多东西，拿出优秀的成绩，来刺激藏臼。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Andiamo alle superiori, studiamo ancora e ancora, e spingiamo Krauss in un angolo.
Turkish (TR): "Üniversiteye gidelim, daha çok çalışalım, mükemmel notlar alalım ve Krauss'u köşeye sıkıştıralım."

Steam (ST): That guy acts like we're nothing, but I'm sure he feels pretty well cornered in the inside. If only he'd just learn his place and die. If he did, we could become the Head. Rudolf won't take the job. That kid can't go against us."
Umineko Project (UP): "That guy makes a face as though we're nothing, but I'm sure he feels pretty well cornered in his heart. If only he would just learn his place and die. If he did, we could become the head. Rudolf will be nice enough to decline. That kid can't go against us."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That guy makes a face as though we're nothing, but I'm sure he feels pretty well cornered in his heart. If only he would just learn his place and die. If he did, we could become the head. Rudolf would just refuse. That kid can't go against us."
PC Japanese (JP): あいつ、何でもなさそうな顔をしてるけど、きっと心は相当追い詰められてるわ。早く身の程を思い知って死んじゃえばいいのに。そうすれば、私たちが当主になれる。留弗夫は辞退してくれるわ。あの子は私には逆らえないもの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あいつ、何でもなさそうな顔をしてるけど、きっと心は相当追い詰められてるわ。早く身の程を思い知って死んじゃえばいいのに。そうすれば、私たちが当主になれる。留弗夫は辞退してくれるわ。あの子は私には逆らえないもの」
Russian (RU): "Этот парень вечно делает такое лицо, словно мы ничто, но уверена, в глубине души он чувствует себя загнанным в угол. Если бы он только узнал своё место, то сдох бы. Случись это — и мы можем стать главой. А Рудольф просто откажется. Этот мальчишка не может пойти против нас."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Aquele cara nos olha como se não fôssemos nada, mas eu tenho certeza que, no fundo da sua alma, ele está bem preocupado. Se ele apenas aprendesse qual é o seu lugar e morresse. Se ele fizesse isso, nós nos tornaríamos a chefe. O Rudolf seria gentil o bastante para recusar. Aquela criança não consegue ir contra nós."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那傢伙，別看他擺出副啥事沒有的臉，內心一定已經被逼上了絕路。快點明白自己是塊什麼料，去死好了。這樣一來，我們就能當上當主。留弗夫是會自己推辭的。那孩子是不會反抗我的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那家伙，别看他摆出副啥事没有的脸，内心一定已经被逼上了绝路。快点明白自己是块什么料，去死好了。这样一来，我们就能当上当主。留弗夫是会自己推辞的。那孩子是不会反抗我的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quello là fa un'espressione come per dire che non siamo nulla, ma sono sicura che si senta all'angolo nel suo cuore. Se solo capisse la sua posizione e morisse. Se lo facesse, potremmo essere noi il capo. Rudolf si rifiuterebbe e basta. {n}Quel ragazzo non può andare contro di noi."
Turkish (TR): "Herif sanki biz bir hiçmişiz gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor ama eminim kalbinde çok iyi köşeye sıkışmış hissediyordur. Keşke haddini bilse ve ölseydi. Eğer ölseydi, reis biz olurduk. Rudolf reddetme nezaketini gösterirdi. O çocuk bize karşı gelemez."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Father told me to be womanly... Because I'm a woman, no matter how hard I tried, Father wouldn't have passed the Headship on to me, even if I had been born before Nii-san...
Umineko Project (UP): "Father is telling me to be womanly... No matter how hard I try, as long as I'm a woman, Father will never pass on the headship to me... even if I'd been born before Nii‐san..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Father told me to be womanly... No matter how hard I try, as long as I'm a woman, even if I had been born before Nii-san, Father wouldn't pass on the headship to me...
PC Japanese (JP): 「お父様は、私に女らしくしろと言っているのよ…。私がどれだけ頑張ろうと、女である限り、例え私が兄さんより先に生まれていたとしても、私に当主を譲ることはないのよ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お父様は、私に女らしくしろと言っているのよ…。私がどれだけ頑張ろうと、女である限り、例え私が兄さんより先に生まれていたとしても、私に当主を譲ることはないのよ…」
Russian (RU): "Отец сказал мне быть женственной... Как бы я ни старалась, пока я остаюсь женщиной, даже родись я перед нии‐саном, отец не передаст главенство мне..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ele está me dizendo para ser mais feminina... Não importa o quanto eu tente, enquanto eu for mulher, ele nunca vai passar a liderança para mim... mesmo se eu tivesse nascido antes do nii‐san..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「爸說了，叫我像個女人樣…。不管怎麼努力，只要我還身為女人，即使我先於哥出生，也不會把當主讓給我…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸说了，叫我像个女人样…。不管怎么努力，只要我还身为女人，即使我先于哥出生，也不会把当主让给我…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Papà mi ha detto di essere una donna... per quanto provi duramente, finché sarò una donna, anche se fossi nata prima di Nii-san, mio Padre non passerebbe a me il comando...
Turkish (TR): "Babam bana kadınsı olmamı söylüyor... Ne kadar çabalarsam çabalayayım, kadın olduğum için babam reisliği asla bana devretmeyecek... Nii-san'dan önce doğmuş olsaydım bile..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): No matter how much effort I put in, ...I can't become anything more than a woman. I won't be acknowledged. Nii-san doesn't try at all, but I can't surpass him. He'll look down on me forever..."
Umineko Project (UP): "No matter how much effort I put in, ......I can't become anything more than a woman. I won't be accepted. I can't surpass Nii‐san, who doesn't try at all. I will always be looked down upon..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No matter how much effort I put in, ......I can't become anything more than a woman. I won't be accepted. I can't surpass Nii-san, who doesn't try at all. I will always be looked down upon..."
PC Japanese (JP): 私がどれだけ努力を重ねようとも、……私は女以上の何者にもなれない。認められない。何の努力もしない兄さんを、超えられない。永遠に見下され続ける…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私がどれだけ努力を重ねようとも、……私は女以上の何者にもなれない。認められない。何の努力もしない兄さんを、超えられない。永遠に見下され続ける…」
Russian (RU): "Сколько бы сил я ни прилагала... я не могу стать ни чем иным, кроме как женщиной. Меня не примут. Я не могу превзойти нии‐сана, который вообще не старается. На меня вечно будут смотреть свысока..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não importa quanto esforço eu coloque, ......não posso ser nada mais do que uma mulher. Eu não serei aceita. Eu não conseguirei superar o nii‐san, que sequer tenta. Eu sempre serei menosprezada..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我不管積累多少努力，……都不可能成為並非女人的別的誰。不會獲得認可。超不過，沒有付出任何努力的哥哥。永遠被人瞧不起…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我不管积累多少努力，……都不可能成为并非女人的别的谁。不会获得认可。超不过，没有付出任何努力的哥哥。永远被人瞧不起…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per quanti sforzi faccia... non posso diventare che una donna. Non sarò accettata. Non posso sorpassare Nii-san, che non prova per niente. Sarò guardata con disprezzo..."
Turkish (TR): "Ne kadar çaba gösterirsem göstereyim, ......bir kadından fazlası olamam. Kabul edilmeyeceğim. Hiç çaba göstermeyen Nii-san'ı geçemem. Her zaman hor görüleceğim..."

Steam (ST): "...Father and Krauss are the worst kind of male supremacists. If only they'd just die."
Umineko Project (UP): "...Father and Krauss are the worst kind of male supremacists. I wish they'd just fucking die already."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Father and Krauss are the worst kind of male supremacists. If only they'd just die."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…お父様も蔵臼も、最低の男尊主義者だわ。早く死んじゃえばいいのに。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…お父様も蔵臼も、最低の男尊主義者だわ。早く死んじゃえばいいのに」
Russian (RU): "...Отец и Краусс — худшие из шовинистов. Вот бы они сдохли."

Turkish (TR): "...Babam ve Krauss erkek üstünlükçülerinin en kötüleri. Keşke ölüp gitseler."

Steam (ST): ...She cursed them for my sake.
Umineko Project (UP): ......She would curse in my place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......She cursed them for my sake.
PC Japanese (JP): ……彼女は、私の代わりに悪態を付く。
Russian (RU): ......Она поносила их ради меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela os amaldiçoou no meu lugar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……她，代我罵出了髒話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……她，代我骂出了脏话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Li maledisse per il mio bene.
Turkish (TR): ......Benim yerime de küfrederdi.

Steam (ST): Words that I couldn't say so easily, ...she said for me.
Umineko Project (UP): Words that I couldn't say carelessly, ...she would say for me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Words that I couldn't say carelessly, ...she said for me.
PC Japanese (JP): 私には滅多なことでは口にできない言葉を、…彼女が私に代わって口にしてくれる。
Russian (RU): Слова, которые я не могла произнести по неосторожности... она произносила их за меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Palavras que eu não conseguiria dizer de forma tão descuidada... ela as disse por mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 代替我將，平常絕不會輕易說出口的話，罵了出來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 代替我将，平常绝不会轻易说出口的话，骂了出来…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le parole che io non potevo dire con noncuranza... le disse per me.
Turkish (TR): Benim düşünmeden söyleyemeyeceğim sözleri, ...o benim için söylerdi.

Steam (ST): Even though I understand that she's just another part of myself inside of me, ...I feel like she's the only ally I have who can sympathize with me.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Even though I understood that she was just another part of myself inside of me, ...I felt like she was the only ally I had who would sympathize with me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though I understood that she was just another part of myself inside of me, ...I felt like she was the only ally I had who could sympathize with me.
PC Japanese (JP): …内なるもうひとりの自分であるとわかっていても、…私にとっては、唯一同情してくれる味方なのだ。
Russian (RU): И хотя я понимала, что она была лишь частью меня во мне... Мне казалось, что она была единственной союзницей, способной посочувствовать мне.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mesmo eu entendo que ela era apenas uma parte de mim que estava na minha consciência, ...eu senti como se ela fosse a minha única aliada que simpatizava comigo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …儘管明白，她是我內心之中的另一個我，…對我來說，她也是唯一同情我的好伙伴。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …尽管明白，她是我内心之中的另一个我，…对我来说，她也是唯一同情我的好伙伴。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se capivo che era solo un'altra parte di me stessa dentro di me... mi sembrava essere l'unica alleata che avevo che poteva simpatizzare con me.
Turkish (TR): ...Onun benim içimdeki başka bir parçam olduğunu anlamış olsam da, ...bana sempati gösterecek tek müttefikimin o olduğunu hissediyordum.

Steam (ST): However, while sympathy might do a lot to calm my heart, it won't do anything to improve my current situation. ...In the end, she can only console me for however long it takes me to be dejected by reality...before I finally accept it.
Umineko Project (UP): However, while sympathy might calm my heart somewhat, it wouldn't do anything to improve my current situation. ......In the end, she could only console me when I was dejected by reality, and for the amount of time I needed to accept it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, while sympathy could calm my heart significantly, it wouldn't do anything to improve my current situation. ......In the end, she could only console me when I was dejected by reality, and when I needed to accept it.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、同情は心を幾分か楽にしてくれるかもしれないが、現状を何も改善してはくれない。……結局、現実に落胆し、それを受け容れるのに必要な時間分だけ、心を慰めてくれるだけなのだ。
Russian (RU): Однако хоть сочувствие и могло значительно успокоить моё сердце, ему было не под силу сделать нечто большее в сложившейся ситуации. ......В конечном итоге, она могла лишь утешать меня, когда я была подавлена и угнетена реальностью и должна была смириться с ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, enquanto essa simpatia acalmava meu coração de alguma forma, isso não iria melhorar em nada a minha situação atual. ......No fim, ela só podia me consolar quando eu fui rejeitada pela sociedade, e também pelo tempo que eu precisei para aceitar isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，同情雖或許會讓心裡稍微好受些，但對現狀卻不會有任何改善。……結果，這就僅僅是在接受無可奈何的現實所必需的那段時間中，安慰一下心靈而已。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，同情虽或许会让心里稍微好受些，但对现状却不会有任何改善。……结果，这就仅仅是在接受无可奈何的现实所必需的那段时间中，安慰一下心灵而已。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, anche se la comprensione poteva calmare molto il mio cuore, non migliorava la mia situazione. ... Alla fine, mi poteva solo consolare quando ero abbattuta dalla realtà, e quando dovevo accettarlo.
Turkish (TR): Yine de, sempati kalbimi biraz sakinleştirse de, mevcut durumumu iyileştirmek adına hiçbir şey yapamazdı. ......Sonuç olarak, beni sadece gerçekler karşısında kederlendiğimde ve bunu kabullenmem için gereken süre boyunca teselli edebilirdi.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Grazie. Hai fatto abbastanza. ... Ora che siamo arrivate a questo, diventerò una lady talmente elegante da sorprendere mio Padre... troverò un uomo eccellente, con il quale Nii-san non può neanche essere comparato..."

Steam (ST): "All Father said was that he won't let a woman succeed the Headship "now". But even that's just a rule Father made up. Since he made it, he can get rid of it."
Umineko Project (UP): "Father says, or at least {i:right now} he says, that he won't let a woman succeed the head. But that's never been anything more than a rule that Father decided on. Since Father decided on it, he can abolish it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Father said that he won't let a woman succeed the head 'now'. But that's never been anything more than a rule that Father decided on. Since Father decided on it, he can reject it.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お父様は、少なくとも“今”は、女に当主を継がせないと言っている。でも、それすらも所詮はお父様が決めたルールでしかないの。お父様が決めた以上、それを破棄出来るのもお父様」

Umineko Project (UP): "Y‐...yes. I'm serious. ......It will indeed be quite sad to throw away the determination from my years as a young girl. ...It will pain my heart to betray you, my younger self. ......But this way is the most realistic...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Y, ...yes. I'm serious. ......It will indeed be quite sad to throw away the determination from my years as a young girl. ...It will pain my heart to betray you, my younger self. ......But this way is the most realistic...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「え、…えぇ。本気よ。……少女時代からの決意を捨てるのは、確かにとても悲しいこと。…私の少女時代そのものであるあなたを裏切るのは、私も心苦しいわ。……でも、それが一番現実的なのよ…！」
Russian (RU): "Д‐да, я серьёзно. ......Согласна, печально будет отбросить стремления моих юных лет. ...Моему сердцу будет больно предавать тебя, моё молодое я. ......Но такой расклад наиболее реалистичен."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "S‐Sim. Eu estou séria. ......De fato, será muito triste jogar fora toda aquela determinação dos meus anos de garota. ...Vai doer no meu coração trair você, minha eu mais jovem. ......Mas esse é o meio mais realista...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯、…嗯嗯。認真的。……捨棄從少女時代起抱有的決心，確實是非常可悲。…背叛本身就是我少女時代的你，也很讓我難過。……但是，這法子是最現實的啊…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯、…嗯嗯。认真的。……舍弃从少女时代起抱有的决心，确实是非常可悲。…背叛本身就是我少女时代的你，也很让我难过。……但是，这法子是最现实的啊…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "S... Sì. Sono seria. ... Di certo sarà triste gettare al vento la determinazione che avevo da ragazza. ... Mi spezzerà il cuore tradire te, la giovane me stessa. {n}Ma questo è il modo più realistico...!"
Turkish (TR): "E-...Evet. Ciddiyim. ......Gençlik yıllarımdaki kararlılığımı bir kenara atmak gerçekten çok üzücü olacak. ...Sana, gençliğime ihanet etmek kalbimi incitecek. ......Ama bu yol en gerçekçi olanı...!"

Steam (ST): In that moment, my body changed, and I was no longer myself from back then, but as I am now: a "wife" and "mother".
Umineko Project (UP): In that moment, my body changed, and I was no longer myself from back then, but as I am now: a "wife" and "mother".

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele momento, meu corpo mudou, eu não era mais quem eu costumava ser, mas quem eu sou agora: uma "esposa" e uma "mãe".

Steam (ST): Yes......this is a "dream". Even so, "she" still possessed the same ambition and desire as always, and she argued back, with her expression displaying clear displeasure at this change.
Umineko Project (UP): Yes......this is a "dream". Even so, "she" still possessed the same ambition and desire as always, and she argued back, with her expression displaying clear displeasure at this change.
PC Japanese (JP): [=OG]

Russian (RU): Да...... это всего‐лишь "мечты". Но даже так, "она" обладала привычным честолюбием и желаниями, что не могло не вызвать волну раздражения и недовольства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim......isto é um "sonho". Mesmo que "ela" ainda possuísse a mesma ambição e o desejo de sempre e argumentasse contra isso, com sua expressão demonstrando um claro desgosto em relação a essa mudança.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sì... questo è un "sogno". Anche così, "lei" possedeva ancora la stessa ambizione e desiderio di sempre, e ribatté, con la sua espressione che mostrava chiaro disappunto per questo cambiamento.
Turkish (TR): Evet......bu bir "rüya". Yine de, "o" her zamanki gibi aynı hırs ve arzuya sahipti ve bu değişiklikten duyduğu hoşnutsuzluğu açıkça gösteren ifadesiyle karşılık verdi.

Turkish (TR): "Hayallerini bir kenara mı atıyorsun? ......Ve hatta beni de bir kenara mı atıyorsun?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "I'm not throwing anything away. ...I'm an adult, and the day has come for me to part ways with you."
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm not throwing anything away. ......It's just that I've become an adult, and the time has come for us to go our separate ways."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'm not throwing anything away. ......It's just that I've become an adult, and I'm different from you now."
PC Japanese (JP): 「捨てるんじゃない。……私も大人になって、あなたと決別する日が来たということよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「捨てるんじゃない。……私も大人になって、あなたと決別する日が来たということよ」
Russian (RU): "Я ничего не отбрасываю. ......Просто я повзрослела и теперь отличаюсь от тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não estou jogando nada fora. ......É apenas que eu virei uma adulta, e a hora de nos separarmos chegou."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不是捨棄。……我也是大人了，是時候與你訣別了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不是舍弃。……我也是大人了，是时候与你诀别了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non sto gettando via nulla. ... Sono semplicemente diventata adulta, e sono diversa da te ora."
Turkish (TR): "Ben hiçbir şeyi bir kenara atmıyorum. ......Ben sadece artık bir yetişkin oldum ve yollarımızı ayırmamızın zamanı geldi."

Steam (ST): "That's right. Eva's already become an adult. She's even forgotten how to use magic, ...and now she's the mother of a single child. She forgot all about how magic can grant one's own dreams, and now she's forcing those dreams onto her son."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right. You've already become an adult. You've even forgotten how to use magic. ......You are now the mother of a child. You've forgotten the magic that can grant your own dreams, and are now pushing those dreams onto your son."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's right. Eva's already become an adult. She's even forgotten how to use magic. ......She is now the mother of a single child. She's forgotten the magic that can grant her own dreams, and is now pushing those dreams onto her son.
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうね。絵羽はもう大人になったわ。魔法の使い方さえ忘れてしまった。……今は一児の母。自ら夢を叶える魔法を忘れ去って、その夢を息子に押し付けている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうね。絵羽はもう大人になったわ。魔法の使い方さえ忘れてしまった。……今は一児の母。自ら夢を叶える魔法を忘れ去って、その夢を息子に押し付けている」
Russian (RU): "Правильно. Ева уже взрослая. Она даже забыла, как пользоваться магией. ......Теперь она мать единственного ребёнка. Она забыла, что магия может воплотить её мечты и пихает их своему сыну."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo. Você já virou uma adulta. Já esqueceu até como usar magia. ......Agora você é mãe de uma criança. Você esqueceu que essa magia pode garantir seus próprios sonhos, e agora está tentando empurrar seus sonhos para seu filho."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是呢。繪羽已經成為大人了。連怎麼用魔法都忘了。……現在是一兒之母。忘了實現自己夢想的魔法，把這個夢硬推給了兒子。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是呢。绘羽已经成为大人了。连怎么用魔法都忘了。……现在是一儿之母。忘了实现自己梦想的魔法，把这个梦硬推给了儿子。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Vero. Eva è già diventata un'adulta. Ha addirittura dimenticato come usare la magia. ... Ora è la Madre di un solo bambino. Ha dimenticato che anche la magia può realizzare i suoi sogni, e ora li sta affibbiando a suo figlio.
Turkish (TR): "Doğru. Sen çoktan bir yetişkin oldun. Büyü kullanmayı bile unuttun. ......Şimdi bir çocuk annesisin. Kendi hayallerini gerçekleştirebilecek büyüyü unuttun ve şimdi bu hayalleri oğluna yüklüyorsun."

Steam (ST): "...Even though Father and Krauss ruined your life, you're trying to push your dreams onto your son, ruining his life. ...Is that what you call being an adult?"
Umineko Project (UP): "...Even though you had your own life messed with so much by Father and Krauss, you're trying to push your dreams onto your son, and mess with his life too. ......Is that what being an adult is all about?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Even though Father and Krauss made your own life so chaotic, you're trying to push your dreams onto your son, and make his life chaotic too. ......Is that what you call being an adult?"
PC Japanese (JP): …自らの人生を、お父様や蔵臼によって滅茶苦茶にされたくせに、あなたも自らの夢を息子に押し付けて、滅茶苦茶にしようとしているの。……それが大人というものなの？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…自らの人生を、お父様や蔵臼によって滅茶苦茶にされたくせに、あなたも自らの夢を息子に押し付けて、滅茶苦茶にしようとしているの。……それが大人というものなの？」
Russian (RU): "...И хотя отец с Крауссом превратили твою жизнь в бардак, ты пытаешься спихнуть свои мечты своему сыну и его жизнь превратить в бардак. ......Это, по‐твоему, значит быть взрослым?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Mesmo tendo a sua vida tão bagunçada por causa do pai e do Krauss, você está tentando empurrar seus sonhos para seu filho, acabando com a vida dele também. ......É isso que significa ser uma adulta?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…自己的人生被爸与藏臼糟蹋得一团糟的你，也要把自己的梦想硬推给儿子，糟蹋他的人生吗？……这就是所谓的大人？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche se Papà e Krauss hanno reso così caotica la tua vita, stai cercando di affidare i tuoi sogni a tuo figlio e rendere caotica anche la sua. ... È questo che definisci essere un'adulta?"
Turkish (TR): "...Babam ve Krauss tarafından kendi hayatınla o kadar çok oynanmış olmasına rağmen, hayallerini oğlunun üzerine yıkmaya ve onun da hayatını mahvetmeye çalışıyorsun. ......Yetişkin olmak böyle bir şey mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "G-George is a son I'm proud of, one who won't embarrass himself no matter where he goes...! The dream I wasn't granted might come true for George...! Jessica's a delinquent in both her grades and her behavior. And she's a woman! If only Jessica would step down, George would become the heir...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "G‐George is my pride and joy, who won't embarrass me no matter where he goes...! The dream that wasn't granted me might be granted to George...! Jessica's grades and behavior aren't good at all. And she's a woman! If only Jessica would step down, George could become the heir...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "G, George is a confident son who won't embarrass himself no matter where he goes...! The dream that wasn't granted me might be granted to George...! Jessica's grades and behavior aren't good at all. And she's a woman! If only Jessica would step down, George would become the heir...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「じょ、譲治はどこに出しても恥ずかしくない自慢の息子よ…！　私には叶えられなかった夢を、譲治なら叶えられるかもしれない…！　朱志香なんて成績も品行も不良じゃない。それに女なのよ！　朱志香さえ辞退してくれれば、譲治が跡継ぎになることだって…！」
Russian (RU): "Д‐Джордж — уверенный в себе сын, который не опозорится, куда бы он ни пошёл!.. Мечта, не исполнившаяся для меня, исполнится для Джорджа!.. Оценки и поведение Джессики никуда не годятся. Да вдобавок она женщина! Стоит только Джессике сойти с дистанции, и наследником станет Джордж!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "G‐George é meu orgulho e felicidade, que não me envergonha não importa onde vá...! O sonho que não foi garantido a mim pode ser garantido ao George...! As notas e o comportamento da Jessica não são nada bons. E ela é uma mulher! Se a Jessica renunciasse, o George poderia se tornar o chefe...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「讓、讓治是我的，不論到哪裡都不會丟人的驕傲的兒子…！我實現不了的夢想，換做讓治或許就能實現…！朱志香成績差，品行也不端。而且是個女人！只要朱志香自己推辭掉，讓治成為繼承人也是有可能…！」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "G-George è un ragazzo fiducioso che non si metterà in imbarazzo ovunque vada...! Il sogno che non si è realizzato per me potrebbe realizzarsi per George...! I voti e l'atteggiamento di Jessica non sono per nulla buoni. Ed è una donna! {n}Se solo Jessica si tirasse indietro, George diventerebbe l'erede...!"
Turkish (TR): "G-George benim gurur ve neşe kaynağım, nereye giderse gitsin beni utandırmayacak...! Bana nasip olmayan bir hayal George'a nasip olabilir...! Jessica'nın notları ve davranışları hiç iyi değil. Ve o bir kadın! Eğer Jessica geri adım atarsa, George varis olabilir...!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Get ahold of yourself. When you see Dad and the rest, all that sleepiness'll go right out the window. Let's all give it our best, okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Get ahold of yourself. When you see the faces of Dad and the rest, all that sleepiness'll go right out the window. Let's do our best to stay firm, alright?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Get a hold of yourself. When you see the faces of Father and the rest, all that sleepiness'll go right out the window. Let's do our best to stay firm, alright?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「しっかりしろよ。親父たちの顔を見れば、眠気もすっ飛ぶさ。せいぜいお互い、頑張ろうぜ？」
Russian (RU): "Возьми себя в руки. Когда увидишь лица отца и остальных, вся эта сонливость как в трубу вылетит. Давай как следует постараемся сохранять твёрдость, ладно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Controle‐se. Quando você ver o rosto do pai e dos outros, toda a sua sonolência vai direto pela janela. Vamos fazer o nosso melhor para nos mantermos firmes, certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「振作點。等看了爸他們那幾張臉，睡意就會被吹跑了。咱們彼此，都好好加把勁吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「振作点。等看了爸他们那几张脸，睡意就会被吹跑了。咱们彼此，都好好加把劲吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Datevi una calmata. Quando vedrete la faccia di Papà e degli altri, la vostra sonnolenza volerà dritta fuori dalla finestra. Facciamo del nostro meglio per rimanere calmi, d'accordo?"
Turkish (TR): "Kendini topla. Babam ve diğerlerinin yüzlerini gördüğünde, tüm o uykulu halin birden uçup gidecek. Güçlü kalmak için elimizden geleni yapalım, tamam mı?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...That's right. We have to keep it together, especially this year..."
Umineko Project (UP): "...That's right. We have to stay firm, especially this year..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…そうね。特に今年は、しっかりしないとね…」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…是呢。特别是今年，不振作起精神来可不行呢…」

Turkish (TR): "...Bu doğru. Güçlü olmalıyız, özellikle bu yıl..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva

Aah, o que eu fiz...? O que eu fiz......?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi

PC Japanese (JP): 「そんなことあらへん。譲治はどこに出しても恥ずかしゅうない、わしらの自慢の息子や。仮に、絵羽の思惑が多少混じっとったとしても、結果オーライっちゅうもんやないか！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そんなことあらへん。譲治はどこに出しても恥ずかしゅうない、わしらの自慢の息子や。仮に、絵羽の思惑が多少混じっとったとしても、結果オーライっちゅうもんやないか！」
Russian (RU): "Это неправда. Джордж — наш замечательный сын, который будет вести себя и поступать достойно, куда бы ни пошёл. Ева, даже если твои чаяния слегка смешались, ведь в итоге всё получилось просто отлично, не так ли?!"

Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Hideyoshi held on tightly to Eva's shoulders, just by his firmness, he communicated that there was no need to say anything more...
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉は絵羽の肩をぐっと抱き寄せると、その力強さだけで、それ以上を語る必要はないと伝えるのだった…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele puxou Eva para perto por seu ombro e, de forma firme, ele a informou de que não havia necessidade dela falar mais aquilo...

Steam (ST): Maybe it was because the typhoon was getting closer. The lively cries of the seagulls, which usually greeted them when they arrived, couldn't be heard at all...
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe it was because the typhoon was getting closer. The lively cries of the seagulls, which usually greeted them when they arrived, couldn't be heard at all...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe it was because the typhoon was getting closer. The lively cries of the seagulls, which usually greeted them when they arrived, couldn't be heard at all...
PC Japanese (JP): 台風が近付いているせいだろうか。いつもなら賑やかに迎えてくれるはずのうみねこの鳴き声が、まったく聞こえなかった…。
Russian (RU): Наверное, причиной всему был надвигающийся тайфун. Бойких голосов чаек, обычно приветствовавших их, не было слышно вообще...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 是台风正在逼近的原因吗。一点都听不到，平常总是热热闹闹地迎接他们的，海猫的鸣叫声…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse è per via del tifone che si avvicinava. Il vivido verso dei gabbiani, che usava accoglierli all'arrivo, non si poté udire per nulla...
